word.german1912: Denn wie kann ich zusehen dem Übel, das mein Volk treffen würde? Und wie kann ich zusehen, daß mein Geschlecht umkomme?
word.french1910: Car comment pourrais-je voir le malheur qui atteindrait mon peuple, et comment pourrais-je voir la destruction de ma race?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我怎忍看見我的族人消滅呢？”

word.tagalog: Sapagka't paanong ako'y makapagtitiis na makita ang kasamaan na darating sa aking bayan? o paanong ako'y makapagtitiis na makita ang paglipol sa aking kamaganakan?

word.kjv: There was a man in the land of Uz, whose name was Job; and that man was perfect and upright, and one that feared God, and eschewed evil.
word.thailand: มีชายคนหนึ่งในแผ่นดินอูส ชื่อโยบ ชายคนนั้นเป็นคนดีรอบคอบและเที่ยงธรรม เป็นผู้เกรงกลัวพระเจ้าและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย
word.spanish1909: HUBO un varón en tierra de Hus, llamado Job; y era este hombre perfecto y recto, y temeroso de Dios, y apartado del mal.
word.latinvulgate: Vir erat in terra Hus, nomine Job ; et erat vir ille simplex, et rectus, ac timens Deum, et recedens a malo.
word.italian1927: C’era nel paese di Uz un uomo che si chiamava Giobbe. Quest’uomo era integro e retto; temeva Iddio e fuggiva il male.
word.german1912: Es war ein Mann im Lande Uz, der hieß Hiob. Derselbe war schlecht und recht, gottesfürchtig und mied das Böse.
word.french1910: Il y avait dans le pays d'Uts un homme qui s'appelait Job. Et cet homme était intègre et droit; il craignait Dieu, et se détournait du mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 約伯的德行與財富烏斯地有一個人，名叫約伯。這人完全、正直，敬畏　神，遠離罪惡。
word.korean: 우스 땅에 욥이라 이름하는 사람이 있었는데 그 사람은 순전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자더라
word.tagalog: May isang lalake sa lupain ng Uz, na ang pangalan ay Job; at ang lalaking yaon ay sakdal at matuwid, at natatakot sa Dios, at humihiwalay sa kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ Tera tetahi tangata i te whenua o Uhu, ko Hopa tona ingoa; a ko taua tangata he tangata tapatahi, he tika, he tangata wehi ki te Atua, mawehe i te kino.
word.cebuano: Dinhay usa ka tawo sa yuta sa Hus, kinsang ngalan mao si Job; ug kadtong tawohana hingpit ug matarung, ug usa nga mahadlokon sa Dios, ug nagapahilayo sa dautan.
word.hebrew: א איש היה בארץ עוץ איוב שמו והיה האיש ההוא תם וישר וירא אלהים--וסר מרע

word.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil?
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสกับซาตานว่า "เจ้าได้ไตร่ตรองดูโยบผู้รับใช้ของเราหรือไม่ ว่าในแผ่นดินโลกไม่มีใครเหมือนเขา เป็นคนดีรอบคอบและเที่ยงธรรม เกรงกลัวพระเจ้าและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย"
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová dijo á Satán: ¿No has considerado á mi siervo Job, que no hay otro como él en la tierra, varón perfecto y recto, temeroso de Dios, y apartado de mal?
word.latinvulgate: Dixitque Dominus ad eum : Numquid considerasti servum meum Job, quod non sit ei similis in terra, homo simplex et rectus, ac timens Deum, et recedens a malo ?
word.italian1927: E l’Eterno disse a Satana: "Hai tu notato il mio servo Giobbe? Non ce n’è un altro sulla terra che come lui sia integro, retto, tema Iddio e fugga il male".
word.german1912: Der HERR sprach zu Satan: Hast du nicht achtgehabt auf meinen Knecht Hiob? Denn es ist seinesgleichen nicht im Lande, schlecht und recht, gottesfürchtig und meidet das Böse.
word.french1910: L'Eternel dit à Satan: As-tu remarqué mon serviteur Job? Il n'y a personne comme lui sur la terre; c'est un homme intègre et droit, craignant Dieu, et se détournant du mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華問撒但：“你有沒有注意到我的僕人約伯？世上再也沒有一個人像他那樣完全、正直，敬畏　神，遠離罪惡。”
word.korean: 여호와께서 사단에게 이르시되 네가 내 종 욥을 유의하여 보았느냐 ? 그와 같이 순전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자가 세상에 없느니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng Panginoon kay Satanas, Iyo bang pinansin ang aking lingkod na si Job? sapagka't walang gaya niya sa lupa, na sakdal at matuwid na lalake, na natatakot sa Dios at humihiwalay sa kasamaan.
word.maori: Ano ra ko Ihowa ki a Hatana, Kua mahara ranei tou ngakau ki taku pononga, ki a Hopa, kahore hoki he rite mona i te whenua, he tangata ngakau tapatahi, he tika, e wehi ana i te Atua, e mawehe ana i te kino?
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova miingon kang Satanas; Gipalandong mo ba si Job nga akong alagad? Kay walay sama kaniya diha sa yuta, hingpit ug matarung nga tawo, usa nga mahadlokon sa Dios, ug nagapahilayo sa dautan.
word.hebrew: ח ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך על עבדי איוב  כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך על עבדי איוב כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע׃
word.greekot: καὶ εἶπεν αὐτῷ ὁ κύριος προσέσχες τῇ διανοίᾳ σου κατὰ τοῦ παιδός μου ιωβ ὅτι οὐκ ἔστιν κατ' αὐτὸν τῶν ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς ἄνθρωπος ἄμεμπτος ἀληθινός θεοσεβής ἀπεχόμενος ἀπὸ παντὸς πονηροῦ πράγματος

word.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, Hast thou considered my servant Job, that there is none like him in the earth, a perfect and an upright man, one that feareth God, and escheweth evil? and still he holdeth fast his integrity, although thou movedst me against him, to destroy him without cause.
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสกับซาตานว่า "เจ้าได้ไตร่ตรองดูโยบผู้รับใช้ของเราหรือไม่ว่า บนแผ่นดินโลกไม่มีใครเหมือนเขา เป็นคนดีรอบคอบและเที่ยงธรรม เกรงกลัวพระเจ้าและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย เขายังยึดมั่นในความซื่อสัตย์ของเขาอยู่ ถึงแม้เจ้าชวนเราให้ต่อสู้กับเขา เพื่อทำลายเขาโดยไม่มีเหตุ"
word.spanish1909: Y Jehová dijo á Satán: ¿No has considerado á mi siervo Job, que no hay otro como él en la tierra, varón perfecto y recto, temeroso de Dios y apartado de mal, y que aun retiene su perfección, habiéndome tú incitado contra él, para que lo arruinara sin caus
word.latinvulgate: Et dixit Dominus ad Satan : Numquid considerasti servum meum Job, quod non sit ei similis in terra, vir simplex et rectus, ac timens Dem, et recedens a malo, et adhuc retinens innocentiam ? Tu autem commovisti me adversus eum, ut affligerem eum frustra.
word.italian1927: "Hai tu notato il mio servo Giobbe? Non ce n’è un altro sulla terra che come lui sia integro, retto, tema Iddio e fugga il male. Egli si mantiene saldo nella sua integrità benché tu m’abbia incitato contro di lui per rovinarlo senza alcun motivo".
word.german1912: Der HERR sprach zu dem Satan: Hast du nicht acht auf meinen Knecht Hiob gehabt? Denn es ist seinesgleichen im Lande nicht, schlecht und recht, gottesfürchtig und meidet das Böse und hält noch fest an seiner Frömmigkeit; du aber hast mich bewogen, daß ich ihn ohne Ursache verderbt habe.
word.french1910: L'Eternel dit à Satan: As-tu remarqué mon serviteur Job? Il n'y a personne comme lui sur la terre; c'est un homme intègre et droit, craignant Dieu, et se détournant du mal. Il demeure ferme dans son intégrité, et tu m'excites à le perdre sans motif.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華問撒但：“你有沒有注意到我的僕人約伯？世上再也沒有一個人像他那樣完全、正直，敬畏　神，遠離罪惡。雖然你挑撥我與他作對，無緣無故使他傾家蕩產，他還是堅守自己的純全。”
word.korean: 여호와께서 사단에게 이르시되 네가 내 종 욥을 유의하여 보았느냐 ? 그와 같이 순전하고 정직하여 하나님을 경외하며 악에서 떠난 자가 세상에 없느니라 네가 나를 격동하여 까닭없이 그를 치게 하였어도 그가 오히려 자기의 순전을 굳게 지켰느니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng Panginoon kay Satanas, Iyo bang pinansin ang aking lingkod na si Job? sapagka't walang gaya niya sa lupa, na sakdal at matuwid na lalake, na natatakot sa Dios, at humihiwalay sa kasamaan: at siya'y namamalagi sa kaniyang pagtatapat, bagaman ako'y kinilos mo laban sa kaniya, upang ilugmok siya ng walang kadahilanan.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihowa ki a Hatana, Kua mahara ranei tou ngakau ki taku tangata, ki a Hopa? kahore he rite mona i te whenua, he tangata ngakau tapatahi, he tika, e wehi ana i te Atua, e mawehe ana i te kino; u tonu ano hoki tona tapatahitanga, ahakoa e whakaoho ana koe i ahau ki te he mona, kia whakangaromia noatia ia.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova miingon kang Satanas: Gipalandong mo ba ang akong sulogoon nga si Job? kay walay sama kaniya diha sa yuta, usa ka tawong hingpit ug matarung mahadlokon siya sa Dios, ug nagpahilayo sa dautan; ug siya nagapadayon gihapon sa iyang katul-id, bisan ako giagda mo batok kaniya, aron sa paglaglag kaniya sa walay hinungdan.
word.hebrew: ג ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך אל עבדי איוב--כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע ועדנו מחזיק בתמתו ותסיתני בו לבלעו חנם
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר יהוה אל השטן השמת לבך אל עבדי איוב כי אין כמהו בארץ איש תם וישר ירא אלהים וסר מרע ועדנו מחזיק בתמתו ותסיתני בו לבלעו חנם׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν δὲ ὁ κύριος πρὸς τὸν διάβολον προσέσχες οὖν τῷ θεράποντί μου ιωβ ὅτι οὐκ ἔστιν κατ' αὐτὸν τῶν ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς ἄνθρωπος ἄκακος ἀληθινός ἄμεμπτος θεοσεβής ἀπεχόμενος ἀπὸ παντὸς κακοῦ ἔτι δὲ ἔχεται ἀκακίας σὺ δὲ εἶπας τὰ ὑπάρχοντα αὐτοῦ διὰ κενῆς ἀπολέσαι

word.kjv: But he said unto her, Thou speakest as one of the foolish women speaketh. What? shall we receive good at the hand of God, and shall we not receive evil? In all this did not Job sin with his lips.
word.thailand: แต่ท่านตอบนางว่า "เธอพูดอย่างหญิงโฉดจะพึงพูด อะไรกัน เราจะรับสิ่งดีจากพระหัตถ์ของพระเจ้า และจะไม่รับของชั่วบ้างหรือ" ในเหตุการณ์นี้ทั้งสิ้นโยบมิได้กระทำบาปด้วยริมฝีปากของตน
word.spanish1909: Y él le dijo: Como suele hablar cualquiera de las mujeres fatuas, has hablado. También recibimos el bien de Dios, ¿y el mal no recibiremos? En todo esto no pecó Job con sus labios.
word.latinvulgate: Qui ait ad illam : Quasi una de stultis mulieribus locuta es ; si bona suscepimus de manu Dei, mala quare non suscipiamus ? In omnibus his non peccavit Job labiis suis.
word.italian1927: E Giobbe a lei: "Tu parli da donna insensata! Abbiamo accettato il bene dalla mano di Dio, e rifiuteremmo d’accettare il male?" In tutto questo Giobbe non peccò con le sue labbra.
word.german1912: Er aber sprach zu ihr: Du redest, wie die närrischen Weiber reden. Haben wir Gutes empfangen von Gott und sollten das Böse nicht auch annehmen? In diesem allem versündigte sich Hiob nicht mit seinen Lippen.
word.french1910: Mais Job lui répondit: Tu parles comme une femme insensée. Quoi! nous recevons de Dieu le bien, et nous ne recevrions pas aussi le mal! En tout cela Job ne pécha point par ses lèvres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 可是約伯對她說：“你說話像個愚妄的女人。難道我們從　神得福，也不應當受禍嗎？”在這一切事上，約伯並沒有用口犯罪。
word.korean: 그가 이르되 `그대의 말이 어리석은 여자 중 하나의 말 같도다 우리가 하나님께 복을 받았은즉 재앙도 받지 아니하겠느뇨' 하고 이 모든 일에 욥이 입술로 범죄치 아니하니라
word.tagalog: Nguni't sinabi niya sa kaniya, Ikaw ay nagsasalita na gaya ng pagsasalita ng hangal na babae. Ano? tatanggap ba tayo ng mabuti sa kamay ng Dios, at hindi tayo tatanggap ng masama? Sa lahat ng ito ay hindi nagkasala si Job ng kaniyang mga labi.
word.maori: Ano ra ko ia ki a ia, Rite tonu to kupu ki te kupu a tetahi o nga wahine kuware. Ha! kia whiwhi tatou ki te pai i te Atua, a kia kaua e whiwhi ki te kino? I tenei katoa kihai i hara nga ngutu o Hopa.
word.cebuano: Apan siya miingon kaniya: Ikaw nagasulti ingon sa usa sa mga babayeng buang nga nagasulti. Unsa? modawat ba kita sa maayo gikan sa kamot sa Dios, ug dili kita modawat sa dautan? Niining tanan si Job wala makasala pinaagi sa iyang mga ngabil.
word.hebrew: י ויאמר אליה כדבר אחת הנבלות תדברי--גם את הטוב נקבל מאת האלהים ואת הרע לא נקבל בכל זאת לא חטא איוב בשפתיו  {פ}
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליה כדבר אחת הנבלות תדברי גם את הטוב נקבל מאת האלהים ואת הרע לא נקבל בכל זאת לא חטא איוב בשפתיו׃
word.greekot: ὁ δὲ ἐμβλέψας εἶπεν αὐτῇ ὥσπερ μία τῶν ἀφρόνων γυναικῶν ἐλάλησας εἰ τὰ ἀγαθὰ ἐδεξάμεθα ἐκ χειρὸς κυρίου τὰ κακὰ οὐχ ὑποίσομεν ἐν πᾶσιν τούτοις τοῖς συμβεβηκόσιν αὐτῷ οὐδὲν ἥμαρτεν ιωβ τοῖς χείλεσιν ἐναντίον τοῦ θεοῦ

word.kjv: Now when Job's three friends heard of all this evil that was come upon him, they came every one from his own place; Eliphaz the Temanite, and Bildad the Shuhite, and Zophar the Naamathite: for they had made an appointment together to come to mourn with him and to comfort him.
word.thailand: เมื่อสหายทั้งสามของโยบได้ยินถึงภัยพิบัตินี้ทั้งสิ้นที่ได้เกิดขึ้นกับท่าน ต่างก็มาจากที่ของตน คือ เอลีฟัสชาวเทมาน บิลดัดคนชูอาห์ และโศฟาร์ชาวนาอาเมห์ เขาได้นัดมาพร้อมกันเพื่อร่วมทุกข์กับท่านและเล้าโลมใจท่าน
word.spanish1909: Y tres amigos de Job, Eliphaz Temanita, y Bildad Suhita, y Sophar Naamathita, luego que oyeron todo este mal que le había sobrevenido, vinieron cada uno de su lugar; porque habían concertado de venir juntos á condolecerse de él, y á consolarle.
word.latinvulgate: Igitur audientes tres amici Job omne malum quod accidisset ei, venerunt singuli de loco suo, Eliphaz Themanites, et Baldad Suhites, et Sophar Naamathites. Condixerant enim ut pariter venientes visitarent eum, et consolarentur.
word.italian1927: Or tre amici di Giobbe, Elifaz di Teman, Bildad di Suach e Tsofar di Naama, avendo udito tutti questi mali che gli eran piombati addosso, partirono, ciascuno dal suo paese e si misero d’accordo per venire a condolersi con lui e a consolarlo.
word.german1912: Da aber die drei Freunde Hiobs hörten all das Unglück, das über ihn gekommen war, kamen sie, ein jeglicher aus seinem Ort: Eliphas von Theman, Bildad von Suah und Zophar von Naema. Denn sie wurden eins, daß sie kämen, ihn zu beklagen und zu trösten.
word.french1910: Trois amis de Job, Eliphaz de Théman, Bildad de Schuach, et Tsophar de Naama, apprirent tous les malheurs qui lui étaient arrivés. Ils se concertèrent et partirent de chez eux pour aller le plaindre et le consoler!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 三友的慰問約伯的三個朋友，提幔人以利法、書亞人比勒達、拿瑪人瑣法，聽到這一切降在他身上的災禍，就各從自己的地方出發，相約而來對他表同情，安慰他。
word.korean: 때에 욥의 친구 세 사람이 그에게 이 모든 재앙이 임하였다 함을 듣고 각각 자기 처소에서부터 이르렀으니 곧 데만 사람 엘리바스와 수아 사람 빌닷과 나아마 사람 소발이라 그들이 욥을 조문하고 위로하려 하여 상약하고 오더니
word.tagalog: Nang mabalitaan nga ng tatlong kaibigan ni Job ang lahat na kasamaang ito na sumapit sa kaniya sila'y naparoon bawa't isa na mula sa kanikaniyang sariling pook, si Eliphaz na Temanita, at si Bildad na Suhita, at si Sophar na Naamathita: at sila'y nangagkaiisang loob na magsiparoon upang makidamay sa kaniya at aliwin siya.
word.maori: ¶ Na, i te rongonga o nga hoa tokotoru o Hopa ki tenei aitua katoa i pa nei ki a ia, ka haere mai ratou i tona wahi, i tona wahi, a Eripata Temani, a Pirirara Huhi, a Topara Naamati: he mea whakarite hoki na ratou ki a ratou ano kia haere mai ki t e tangi ki a ia, ki te whakamarie i a ia.
word.cebuano: Sa pagkadungog karon sa totolo ka higala ni Job niining mga kadautan nga mingdangat kaniya, ming-adto sila nga tagsatagsa gikan sa iyang kaugalingong dapit; si Eliphaz ang Temanitanhon, si Bildad ang Shitanhon, ug si Sophar ang Naamithitanhon; ug sila nanagsabut nga modu-aw aron sa pagduyog sa iyang kasakit ug paglipay kaniya.
word.hebrew: יא וישמעו שלשת רעי איוב את כל הרעה הזאת הבאה עליו ויבאו איש ממקמו אליפז התימני ובלדד השוחי וצופר הנעמתי ויועדו יחדו לבוא לנוד לו ולנחמו
word.hebrewmodern: וישמעו שלשת רעי איוב את כל הרעה הזאת הבאה עליו ויבאו איש ממקמו אליפז התימני ובלדד השוחי וצופר הנעמתי ויועדו יחדו לבוא לנוד לו ולנחמו׃
word.greekot: ἀκούσαντες δὲ οἱ τρεῖς φίλοι αὐτοῦ τὰ κακὰ πάντα τὰ ἐπελθόντα αὐτῷ παρεγένοντο ἕκαστος ἐκ τῆς ἰδίας χώρας πρὸς αὐτόν ελιφας ὁ θαιμανων βασιλεύς βαλδαδ ὁ σαυχαίων τύραννος σωφαρ ὁ μιναίων βασιλεύς καὶ παρεγένοντο πρὸς αὐτὸν ὁμοθυμαδὸν τοῦ παρακαλέσαι καὶ ἐπισκέψασθαι αὐτόν

word.kjv: He shall deliver thee in six troubles: yea, in seven there shall no evil touch thee.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงช่วยท่านให้พ้นจากความยากลำบากหกประการ เออ เจ็ดประการ จะไม่มีเหตุร้ายมาแตะต้องท่าน
word.spanish1909: En seis tribulaciones te librará, Y en la séptima no te tocará el mal.
word.latinvulgate: In sex tribulationibus liberabit te, et in septima non tangent te malum.
word.italian1927: In sei distrette egli sarà il tuo liberatore e in sette il male non ti toccherà.
word.german1912: Aus sechs Trübsalen wird er dich erretten, und in der siebenten wird dich kein Übel rühren:
word.french1910: Six fois il te délivrera de l'angoisse, Et sept fois le mal ne t'atteindra pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你六次遭遇患難，他都救拔你，就算第七次，災禍也傷不了你。
word.korean: 여섯가지 환난에서 너를 구원하시며 일곱가지 환난이라도 그 재앙이 네게 미치지 않게 하시며
word.tagalog: Kaniyang ililigtas ka sa anim na kabagabagan. Oo, sa pito, ay walang kasamaang kikilos sa iyo.
word.maori: E ono nga matenga e whakaora ai ia i a koe; ahakoa e whitu, e kore te he e pa ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Siya magaluwas kanimo sa unom ka kasamok; Oo, bisan sa pipito ang kadaut dili makadapat kanimo.
word.hebrew: יט  בשש צרות יצילך    ובשבע לא-יגע בך רע
word.hebrewmodern: בשש צרות יצילך ובשבע לא יגע בך רע׃
word.greekot: ἑξάκις ἐξ ἀναγκῶν σε ἐξελεῖται ἐν δὲ τῷ ἑβδόμῳ οὐ μὴ ἅψηταί σου κακόν

word.kjv: Behold, God will not cast away a perfect man, neither will he help the evil doers:
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเจ้าจะไม่ทรงทอดทิ้งคนดีรอบคอบ หรือค้ำจุนผู้กระทำความชั่วร้าย
word.spanish1909: He aquí, Dios no aborrece al perfecto, Ni toma la mano de los malignos.
word.latinvulgate: Deus non projiciet simplicem, nec porriget manum malignis,
word.italian1927: No, Iddio non rigetta l’uomo integro, ne porge aiuto a quelli che fanno il male.
word.german1912: Darum siehe, daß Gott nicht verwirft die Frommen und erhält nicht die Hand der Boshaften,
word.french1910: Non, Dieu ne rejette point l'homme intègre, Et il ne protège point les méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神不丟棄完全人看哪，　神必不離棄完全人，也不扶助行惡的人之手；
word.korean: 하나님은 순전한 사람을 버리지 아니하시고 악한 자를 붙들어 주지 아니하신즉
word.tagalog: Narito, hindi itatakuwil ng Dios ang sakdal na tao, ni aalalayan man niya ang mga manggagawa ng kasamaan.
word.maori: ¶ Nana, e kore te Atua e whakakahore ki te tangata tika, e kore ano e puritia e ia te ringa o nga tangata kino.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang Dios dili mosalikway sa usa ka tawong hingpit. Ni motabang siya sa mga mamumuhat sa dautan.
word.hebrew: כ  הן-אל לא ימאס-תם    ולא-יחזיק ביד-מרעים
word.hebrewmodern: הן אל לא ימאס תם ולא יחזיק ביד מרעים׃
word.greekot: ὁ γὰρ κύριος οὐ μὴ ἀποποιήσηται τὸν ἄκακον πᾶν δὲ δῶρον ἀσεβοῦς οὐ δέξεται

word.kjv: He evil entreateth the barren that beareth not: and doeth not good to the widow.
word.thailand: เขารีดเอาจากหญิงหมันที่ไม่มีลูก และไม่ทำดีอะไรให้แก่หญิงม่าย
word.spanish1909: A la mujer estéril que no paría, afligió; Y á la viuda nunca hizo bien.
word.latinvulgate: Pavit enim sterilem quæ non parit, et viduæ bene non fecit.
word.italian1927: L’iniquo sarà troncato come un albero: ei che divorava la sterile, priva di figli, e non faceva del bene alla vedova!"
word.german1912: er, der beleidigt hat die Einsame, die nicht gebiert, und hat der Witwe kein Gutes getan."
word.french1910: Lui qui dépouille la femme stérile et sans enfants, Lui qui ne répand aucun bienfait sur la veuve!...
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他惡待不能生育，沒有孩子的婦人，也不善待寡婦。
word.korean: 그는 잉태치 못하므로 해산치 못한 여인을 학대하며 과부를 선대치 아니하는 자니라
word.tagalog: Kaniyang sinasakmal ang baog na hindi nanganganak; at hindi gumagawa ng mabuti sa babaing bao.
word.maori: E tukinotia ana e ia te pakoko kihai nei i whanau; kahore hoki ana mahi pai ki te pouaru.
word.cebuano: Siya nagalamoy sa apuli nga wala manganak, Ug wala maghimo ug kaayohan sa babayeng balo.
word.hebrew: כא  רעה עקרה לא תלד    ואלמנה לא ייטיב
word.hebrewmodern: רעה עקרה לא תלד ואלמנה לא ייטיב׃
word.greekot: στεῖραν γὰρ οὐκ εὖ ἐποίησεν καὶ γύναιον οὐκ ἠλέησεν

word.kjv: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.
word.thailand: และพระองค์ตรัสกับมนุษย์ว่า `ดูเถิด ความยำเกรงองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า นั่นแหละคือพระปัญญา และที่จะหันจากความชั่ว คือความเข้าใจ'"
word.spanish1909: Y dijo al hombre: He aquí que el temor del Señor es la sabiduría, Y el apartarse del mal la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixit homini : Ecce timor Domini, ipsa est sapientia, et recedere a malo, intelligentia.
word.italian1927: E disse all’uomo: "Ecco: temere il Signore: questa è la Sapienza, e fuggire il male è l’Intelligenza"."
word.german1912: und sprach zu den Menschen: Siehe, die Furcht des HERRN, das ist Weisheit; und meiden das Böse, das ist Verstand.
word.french1910: Puis il dit à l'homme: Voici, la crainte du Seigneur, c'est la sagesse; S'éloigner du mal, c'est l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他對人說：‘敬畏主就是智慧，遠離邪惡就是聰明。’”
word.korean: 또 사람에게 이르시기를 주를 경외함이 곧 지혜요, 악을 떠남이 명철이라 ! 하셨느니라
word.tagalog: At sa tao ay sinabi niya, Narito, ang pagkatakot sa Dios ay siyang karunungan; at ang paghiwalay sa kasamaan ay pagkaunawa.
word.maori: A ka mea ia ki te tangata, Na, ko te wehi ki te Ariki, ko te whakaaro nui tena; a ko te mawehe atu i te kino, koia te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ug miingon siya sa tawo: Ania karon, ang kahadlok sa Ginoo, nga mao ang kaalam; Ug ang paglikay sa dautan mao ang salabutan.
word.hebrew: כח  ויאמר לאדם--הן יראת אדני היא חכמה    וסור מרע בינה
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר לאדם הן יראת אדני היא חכמה וסור מרע בינה׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν δὲ ἀνθρώπῳ ἰδοὺ ἡ θεοσέβειά ἐστιν σοφία τὸ δὲ ἀπέχεσθαι ἀπὸ κακῶν ἐστιν ἐπιστήμη

word.kjv: When I looked for good, then evil came unto me: and when I waited for light, there came darkness.
word.thailand: แต่เมื่อข้ามองหาของดี ของร้ายก็มาถึง และเมื่อข้าคอยความสว่าง ความมืดก็มาถึง
word.spanish1909: Cuando esperaba yo el bien, entonces vino el mal; Y cuando esperaba luz, la oscuridad vino.
word.latinvulgate: Expectabam bona, et venerunt mihi mala : præstolabar lucem, et eruperunt tenebræ.
word.italian1927: Speravo il bene, ed è venuto il male; aspettavo la luce, ed è venuta l’oscurità!
word.german1912: Ich wartete des Guten, und es kommt das Böse; ich hoffte aufs Licht, und es kommt Finsternis.
word.french1910: J'attendais le bonheur, et le malheur est arrivé; J'espérais la lumière, et les ténèbres sont venues.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我希望得福樂，災禍就來了；我等候光明，幽暗就到了。
word.korean: 내가 복을 바랐더니 화가 왔고 광명을 기다렸더니 흑암이 왔구나
word.tagalog: Pagka ako'y humahanap ng mabuti, ang kasamaan nga ang dumarating: at pagka ako'y naghihintay ng liwanag ay kadiliman ang dumarating.
word.maori: I ahau i tatari ai ki te pai, heoi kua tae mai te kino; tumanako atu ana ahau ki te marama, heoi kua tae mai te pouri.
word.cebuano: Sa diha nga ako nangita sa maayo, unya midangat ang dautan; Sa diha nga ako naghulat sa kahayag, midangat ang kangitngit.
word.hebrew: כו  כי טוב קויתי ויבא רע    ואיחלה לאור ויבא אפל
word.hebrewmodern: כי טוב קויתי ויבא רע ואיחלה לאור ויבא אפל׃
word.greekot: ἐγὼ δὲ ἐπέχων ἀγαθοῖς ἰδοὺ συνήντησάν μοι μᾶλλον ἡμέραι κακῶν

word.kjv: If I rejoiced at the destruction of him that hated me, or lifted up myself when evil found him:
word.thailand: ถ้าข้าเปรมปรีดิ์เมื่อผู้ที่เกลียดชังข้านั้นพินาศ หรือลิงโลดเมื่อเหตุร้ายมาทันเขา
word.spanish1909: Si me alegré en el quebrantamiento del que me aborrecía, Y me regocijé cuando le halló el mal;
word.latinvulgate: Si gavisus sum ad ruinam ejus qui me oderat, et exsultavi quod invenisset eum malum :
word.italian1927: se mi son rallegrato della sciagura del mio nemico ed ho esultato quando gli ha incolto sventura
word.german1912: Hab ich mich gefreut, wenn's meinem Feind übel ging, und habe mich überhoben, darum daß ihn Unglück betreten hatte?
word.french1910: Si j'ai été joyeux du malheur de mon ennemi, Si j'ai sauté d'allégresse quand les revers l'ont atteint,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我若因恨我的人遭災禍而歡喜，或因他遇患難而高興；
word.korean: 내가 언제 나를 미워하는 자의 멸망을 기뻐하였으며 그의 재앙 만남을 인하여 기운을 뽐내었던가
word.tagalog: Kung ako'y nagalak sa kasakunaan niyaong nagtatanim ng loob sa akin, o nagmataas ako ng datnan siya ng kasamaan;
word.maori: Ki te mea i koa ahau ki te whakangaromanga o te tangata i kino ki ahau, i whakaara ake ranei i ahau i te panga o te he ki a ia;
word.cebuano: Kong gikalipay ko ang pagkalaglag niadtong nagdumot kanako, Kun nagpahataas ako sa akong kaugalingon sa diha nga siya hingkaplagan sa kadautan:
word.hebrew: כט  אם-אשמח בפיד משנאי    והתעררתי כי-מצאו רע
word.hebrewmodern: אם אשמח בפיד משנאי והתעררתי כי מצאו רע׃
word.greekot: εἰ δὲ καὶ ἐπιχαρὴς ἐγενόμην πτώματι ἐχθρῶν μου καὶ εἶπεν ἡ καρδία μου εὖγε

word.kjv: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.
word.thailand: เขาร้องทุกข์ ณ ที่นั่น แต่ไม่มีผู้ใดตอบเขา เหตุความเย่อหยิ่งของคนชั่ว
word.spanish1909: Allí clamarán, y él no oirá, Por la soberbia de los malos.
word.latinvulgate: Ibi clamabunt, et non exaudiet propter superbiam malorum.
word.italian1927: Si grida, sì, ma egli non risponde, a motivo della superbia dei malvagi.
word.german1912: Da schreien sie über den Hochmut der Bösen, und er wird sie nicht erhören.
word.french1910: On a beau crier alors, Dieu ne répond pas, A cause de l'orgueil des méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為惡人驕傲的緣故，他們在那裡呼求，　神卻不回答。
word.korean: 그들이 악인의 교만을 인하여 거기서 부르짖으나 응락하는 자가 없음은
word.tagalog: Doo'y tumatawag sila, nguni't walang sumasagot, dahil sa kapalaluan ng mga masamang tao.
word.maori: Karanga ana ratou i reira, heoi kahore he kupu e whakahokia mai, he mea na te whakapehapeha o te hunga kino.
word.cebuano: Didto sila nanagsinggit, apan walay nagtubag, Tungod sa pagkamapahitas-on sa mga tawong dautan.
word.hebrew: יב  שם יצעקו ולא יענה--    מפני גאון רעים
word.hebrewmodern: שם יצעקו ולא יענה מפני גאון רעים׃
word.greekot: ἐκεῖ κεκράξονται καὶ οὐ μὴ εἰσακούσῃ καὶ ἀπὸ ὕβρεως πονηρῶν

word.kjv: Then came there unto him all his brethren, and all his sisters, and all they that had been of his acquaintance before, and did eat bread with him in his house: and they bemoaned him, and comforted him over all the evil that the LORD had brought upon him: every man also gave him a piece of money, and every one an earring of gold.
word.thailand: และบรรดาพี่น้องชายหญิงของท่าน และบรรดาผู้ที่รู้จักท่านมาก่อนได้มาหาท่าน และรับประทานอาหารกับท่านในบ้านของท่าน และเขาทั้งหลายสำแดงความเห็นอกเห็นใจและเล้าโลมท่าน ด้วยเรื่องเหตุร้ายทั้งสิ้นซึ่งพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงนำมาเหนือท่าน และต่างก็ให้เงินแผ่นหนึ่งกับแหวนทองคำวงหนึ่งแก่ท่าน
word.spanish1909: Y vinieron é él todos sus hermanos, y todas sus hermanas, y todos los que antes le habían conocido, y comieron con él pan en su casa, y condoliéronse de él, y consoláronle de todo aquel mal que sobre él había Jehová traído; y cada uno de ellos le dió una
word.latinvulgate: Venerunt autem ad eum omnes fratres sui, et universæ sorores suæ, et cuncti qui noverant eum prius, et comederunt cum eo panem in domo ejus : et moverunt super eum caput, et consolati sunt eum super omni malo quod intulerat Dominus super eum, et dederunt ei unusquisque ovem unam, et inaurem auream unam.
word.italian1927: Tutti i suoi fratelli, tutte le sue sorelle e tutte le sue conoscenze di prima vennero a trovarlo, mangiarono con lui in casa sua, gli fecero le loro condoglianze e lo consolarono di tutti i mali che l’Eterno gli avea fatto cadere addosso; e ognuno d’essi gli dette un pezzo d’argento e un anello d’oro.
word.german1912: Und es kamen zu ihm alle seine Brüder und alle seine Schwestern und alle, die ihn vormals kannten, und aßen mit ihm in seinem Hause und kehrten sich zu ihm und trösteten ihn über alles Übel, das der HERR hatte über ihn kommen lassen. Und ein jeglicher gab ihm einen schönen Groschen und ein goldenes Stirnband.
word.french1910: Les frères, les soeurs, et les anciens amis de Job vinrent tous le visiter, et ils mangèrent avec lui dans sa maison. Ils le plaignirent et le consolèrent de tous les malheurs que l'Eternel avait fait venir sur lui, et chacun lui donna un kesita et un anneau d'or.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 約伯的眾兄弟姊妹和以前認識的人都來見他，在他家裡與他一同吃飯，又因耶和華降予他的一切災禍都對他表同情，安慰他，每人送他一塊銀子和一個金環。
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y nagsiparoon sa kaniya ang lahat niyang mga kapatid na lalake at babae, at lahat na naging kakilala niya ng una, at nagsikain ng tinapay na kasalo niya sa kaniyang bahay; at nakipagdamdam sa kaniya, at inaliw siya tungkol sa lahat na kasamaan na pinasapit sa kaniya ng Panginoon: bawa't tao nama'y nagbigay sa kaniya ng isang putol na salapi, at bawa't isa'y ng isang singsing na ginto.
word.maori: Katahi ka haere mai ona tuakana, ona teina katoa, ratou ko ona tuahine katoa, me te hunga katoa i mohio ki a ia i mua, hei hoa mona, ki te kai taro i roto i tona whare: tangi ana ki a ia, whakamarie ana i a ia mo te he katoa i whakaekea nei e Ih owa ki a ia; a homai ana ki a ia e tenei, e tenei, tetahi moni me tetahi whakakai koura.
word.cebuano: Unya miduol kaniya ang iyang tanang mga kaigsoonan nga lalake, ug ang iyang tanang kaigsoonan nga babaye, ug ang tanan nga kaniadto iyang kaila, ug sa iyang balay nangaon uban kaniya: ug sila nangasubo kaniya, ug naglipay kaniya tungod sa tanan nga kadaut nga gipadangat kaniya ni Jehova: ang tagsatagsa usab ka tawo naghatag kaniya ug usa ka book nga salapi, ug ang tagsatagsa usa ka book nga singsing bulawan.
word.hebrewmodern: ויבאו אליו כל אחיו וכל אחיתיו וכל ידעיו לפנים ויאכלו עמו לחם בביתו וינדו לו וינחמו אתו על כל הרעה אשר הביא יהוה עליו ויתנו לו איש קשיטה אחת ואיש נזם זהב אחד׃
word.greekot: ἤκουσαν δὲ πάντες οἱ ἀδελφοὶ αὐτοῦ καὶ αἱ ἀδελφαὶ αὐτοῦ πάντα τὰ συμβεβηκότα αὐτῷ καὶ ἦλθον πρὸς αὐτὸν καὶ πάντες ὅσοι ᾔδεισαν αὐτὸν ἐκ πρώτου φαγόντες δὲ καὶ πιόντες παρ' αὐτῷ παρεκάλεσαν αὐτόν καὶ ἐθαύμασαν ἐπὶ πᾶσιν οἷς ἐπήγαγεν αὐτῷ ὁ κύριος ἔδωκεν δὲ αὐτῷ ἕκαστος ἀμνάδα μίαν καὶ τετράδραχμον χρυσοῦν ἄσημον

word.kjv: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.
word.thailand: ด้วยว่าพระองค์มิได้ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าผู้ปีติยินดีในความชั่ว ความชั่วร้ายจะไม่อาศัยอยู่กับพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque tú no eres un Dios que ame la maldad: El malo no habitará junto á ti.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam ad te orabo, Domine, mane exaudies vocem meam.
word.italian1927: poiché tu non sei un Dio che prenda piacere nell’empietà; il malvagio non sarà tuo ospite.
word.german1912: Denn du bist nicht ein Gott, dem gottloses Wesen gefällt; wer böse ist, bleibt nicht vor dir.
word.french1910: Car tu n'es point un Dieu qui prenne plaisir au mal; Le méchant n'a pas sa demeure auprès de toi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為你是不喜愛邪惡的　神，惡人不能與你同住。
word.korean: 주는 죄악을 기뻐하는 신이 아니시니 악이 주와 함께 유하지 못하며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ikaw ay di isang Dios na may kaluguran sa kasamaan: ang masama ay hindi tatahang kasama mo.
word.maori: Ehara hoki koe i te Atua e pai ana ki te hara, e kore te kino e noho ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Kay ikaw dili mao ang Dios nga may kalipay diha sa kadautan: Ang dautan dili magapuyo uban kanimo.
word.hebrew: ד  יהוה--בקר תשמע קולי    בקר אערך-לך ואצפה
word.hebrewmodern: כי לא אל חפץ רשע אתה לא יגרך רע׃
word.greekot: τὸ πρωὶ εἰσακούσῃ τῆς φωνῆς μου τὸ πρωὶ παραστήσομαί σοι καὶ ἐπόψομαι

word.kjv: If I have rewarded evil unto him that was at peace with me; (yea, I have delivered him that without cause is mine enemy:)
word.thailand: ถ้าข้าพระองค์ตอบแทนความชั่วแก่ผู้ที่อยู่อย่างสันติกับข้าพระองค์ (แต่ผู้ที่เป็นศัตรูด้วยปราศจากเหตุ ข้าพระองค์เคยช่วยผู้นั้นให้รอดพ้นไป)
word.spanish1909: Si dí mal pago al pacífico conmigo, (Hasta he libertado al que sin causa era mi enemigo;)
word.latinvulgate: Domine Deus meus, si feci istud, si est iniquitas in manibus meis,
word.italian1927: se ho reso mal per bene a chi viveva meco in pace (io che ho liberato colui che m’era nemico senza cagione),
word.german1912: habe ich Böses vergolten denen, so friedlich mit mir lebten, oder die, so mir ohne Ursache feind waren, beschädigt:
word.french1910: Si j'ai rendu le mal à celui qui était paisible envers moi, Si j'ai dépouillé celui qui m'opprimait sans cause,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果我以惡回報那與我為友的人，或是無故掠奪與我為敵的人，
word.korean: 화친한 자를 악으로 갚았거나 내 대적에게 무고히 빼앗았거든
word.tagalog: Kung ako'y gumanti ng kasamaan sa kaniya na may kapayapaan sa akin; (Oo, aking pinawalan siya, na walang anomang kadahilanan ay naging aking kaaway:)
word.maori: Ki te mea i whakahokia e ahau he kino ki te tangata kua mau nei ta maua rongo; i whakaora nei hoki ahau i te tangata i kino noa mai ki ahau:
word.cebuano: Kong ako nagbalus ug dautan kaniya nga diha sa pakigdatit uban kanako; (Oo, akong gitugyan siya nga sa walay gipasikaran nahimong akong kabatok);
word.hebrew: ד  יהוה אלהי אם-עשיתי זאת    אם-יש-עול בכפי
word.hebrewmodern: אם גמלתי שולמי רע ואחלצה צוררי ריקם׃
word.greekot: κύριε ὁ θεός μου εἰ ἐποίησα τοῦτο εἰ ἔστιν ἀδικία ἐν χερσίν μου

word.kjv: Break thou the arm of the wicked and the evil man: seek out his wickedness till thou find none.
word.thailand: ขอพระองค์ทรงหักแขนของคนชั่วและคนกระทำชั่ว ขอทรงค้นความชั่วของเขาออกมาจนหมดสิ้น
word.spanish1909: Quebranta el brazo del malo: Del maligno buscarás su maldad, hasta que ninguna halles.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Fiacca il braccio dell’empio, cerca l’empietà del malvagio finché tu non ne trovi più.
word.german1912: Zerbrich den Arm des Gottlosen und suche heim das Böse, so wird man sein gottlos Wesen nimmer finden.
word.french1910: Brise le bras du méchant, Punis ses iniquités, et qu'il disparaisse à tes yeux!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願你打斷惡人和壞人的膀臂，願你追究他們的惡行，直到清清楚楚。
word.korean: 여호와여, 일어나옵소서 하나님이여, 손을 드옵소서 가난한 자를 잊지 마옵소서
word.tagalog: Baliin mo ang bisig ng masama: at tungkol sa masamang tao, pag-usigin mo ang kaniyang kasamaan hanggang sa wala ka nang masumpungan.
word.maori: Whatiia e koe te ringa o te tangata kino; tena ko te tangata nanakia, whakatakina tona kino, kia kahore ra ano e kitea e koe.
word.cebuano: Dugmoka ang bukton sa dautan; Ug mahatungod sa tawo nga dautan, magapangita ka sa iyang kadautan, hangtud nga wala na gayud ing makaplagan.
word.hebrew: טו  שבר זרוע רשע    ורע תדרוש-רשעו בל-תמצא
word.hebrewmodern: שבר זרוע רשע ורע תדרוש רשעו בל תמצא׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
word.thailand: ผู้ซึ่งไม่ใช้ลิ้นของตนในการนินทาว่าร้าย ไม่กระทำชั่วต่อเพื่อนบ้าน และไม่ตำหนิเพื่อนบ้านของตน
word.spanish1909: El que no detrae con su lengua, Ni hace mal á su prójimo, Ni contra su prójimo acoge oprobio alguno.
word.latinvulgate: Sanctis, qui sunt in terra ejus, mirificavit omnes voluntates meas in eis.
word.italian1927: che non calunnia con la sua lingua, né fa male alcuno al suo compagno, né getta vituperio contro il suo prossimo.
word.german1912: wer mit seiner Zunge nicht verleumdet und seinen Nächstem kein Arges tut und seinen Nächsten nicht schmäht;
word.french1910: Il ne calomnie point avec sa langue, Il ne fait point de mal à son semblable, Et il ne jette point l'opprobre sur son prochain.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他不以舌頭詆毀人，不惡待朋友，也不毀謗他的鄰居。
word.korean: 그 혀로 참소치 아니하고 그 벗에게 행악지 아니하며 그 이웃을 훼방치 아니하며
word.tagalog: Siyang hindi naninirang puri ng kaniyang dila, ni gumagawa man ng kasamaan sa kaniyang kaibigan, ni dumudusta man sa kaniyang kapuwa.
word.maori: Kahore nei e ngautuara tona arero, kahore e kino te mahi ki tona hoa, kahore ana ingoa kino mo tona hoa.
word.cebuano: Siya nga dili magbutang-butang uban sa iyang dila. Ni magabuhat ug kadautan sa iyang higala, Ni magpasipala batok sa iyang isigkatawo;
word.hebrew: ג  לא-רגל על-לשנו--לא-עשה לרעהו רעה    וחרפה לא-נשא על-קרבו
word.hebrewmodern: לא רגל על לשנו לא עשה לרעהו רעה וחרפה לא נשא על קרבו׃
word.greekot: τοῖς ἁγίοις τοῖς ἐν τῇ γῇ αὐτοῦ ἐθαυμάστωσεν πάντα τὰ θελήματα αὐτοῦ ἐν αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
word.thailand: แม้เขาทั้งหลายได้ปองร้ายต่อพระองค์ แม้เขาประดิษฐ์เรื่องชั่วร้าย เขาก็จะกระทำไม่สำเร็จ
word.spanish1909: Porque trazaron el mal contra ti: Fraguaron maquinaciones, mas no prevalecerán.
word.latinvulgate: In te projectus sum ex utero ; de ventre matris meæ Deus meus es tu ;
word.italian1927: perché hanno ordito del male contro a te; han formato malvagi disegni, che non potranno attuare;
word.german1912: Denn sie gedachten dir Übles zu tun und machten Anschläge, die sie nicht konnten ausführen.
word.french1910: Ils ont projeté du mal contre toi, Ils ont conçu de mauvais desseins, mais ils seront impuissants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 雖然他們定下惡計害你，他們所設的陰謀卻不能成功。
word.korean: 대저 저희는 너를 해하려 하여 계교를 품었으나 이루지 못하도다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't sila'y nagakala ng kasamaan laban sa iyo: sila'y nagpanukala ng lalang na hindi nila maisasagawa.
word.maori: He kino hoki ta ratou i whakatakoto ai mou, he mahi nanakia ta ratou i whakaaro ai, kihai nei i taea e ratou.
word.cebuano: Kay gitinguha nila ang dautan batok kanimo; Nanaghunahuna sila ug usa ka lalang nga dili sila makahimo sa pagbuhat.
word.hebrew: יא  פרימו מארץ תאבד    וזרעם מבני אדם
word.hebrewmodern: כי נטו עליך רעה חשבו מזמה בל יוכלו׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ σὲ ἐπερρίφην ἐκ μήτρας ἐκ κοιλίας μητρός μου θεός μου εἶ σύ

word.kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
word.thailand: แม้ข้าพระองค์จะเดินไปตามหุบเขาเงามัจจุราช ข้าพระองค์ไม่กลัวอันตรายใดๆ เพราะพระองค์ทรงสถิตกับข้าพระองค์ คทาและธารพระกรของพระองค์เล้าโลมข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Aunque ande en valle de sombra de muerte, No temeré mal alguno; porque tú estarás conmigo: Tu vara y tu cayado me infundirán aliento.
word.latinvulgate: Innocens manibus et mundo corde, qui non accepit in vano animam suam, nec juravit in dolo proximo suo.
word.italian1927: Quand’anche camminassi nella valle dell’ombra della morte, io non temerei male alcuno, perché tu sei meco; il tuo bastone e la tua verga son quelli che mi consolano.
word.german1912: Und ob ich schon wanderte im finstern Tal, fürchte ich kein Unglück; denn du bist bei mir, dein Stecken und dein Stab trösten mich.
word.french1910: Quand je marche dans la vallée de l'ombre de la mort, Je ne crains aucun mal, car tu es avec moi: Ta houlette et ton bâton me rassurent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我雖然行過死蔭的山谷，也不怕遭受傷害，因為你與我同在；你的杖你的竿都安慰我。
word.korean: 내가 사망의 음침한 골짜기로 다닐지라도 해를 두려워하지 않을것은 주께서 나와 함께 하심이라 주의 지팡이와 막대기가 나를 안위하시나이다
word.tagalog: Oo, bagaman ako'y lumalakad sa libis ng lilim ng kamatayan, wala akong katatakutang kasamaan; sapagka't ikaw ay sumasa akin: ang iyong pamalo at ang iyong tungkod, ay nagsisialiw sa akin.
word.maori: Ae, ahakoa haere ahau i te awaawa o te atarangi o te mate, kahore he kino e wehi ai ahau: no te mea kei toku taha koe; ko tau rakau, ko tau tokotoko, ko ena hei oranga ngakau moku.
word.cebuano: Oo, bisan magalakaw ako latas sa walog sa landong sa kamatayon, Ako walay kahadlok sa bisan unsa nga dautan; Kay ikaw nagauban kanako; Ang imong baras ug ang imong sungkod, kini nagapalig-on kanako.
word.hebrew: ד  גם כי-אלך בגיא צלמות לא-אירא רע--    כי-אתה עמדי שבטך ומשענתך    המה ינחמני
word.hebrewmodern: גם כי אלך בגיא צלמות לא אירא רע כי אתה עמדי שבטך ומשענתך המה ינחמני׃
word.greekot: ἀθῷος χερσὶν καὶ καθαρὸς τῇ καρδίᾳ ὃς οὐκ ἔλαβεν ἐπὶ ματαίῳ τὴν ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ καὶ οὐκ ὤμοσεν ἐπὶ δόλῳ τῷ πλησίον αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์เกลียดชุมนุมคนที่ทำชั่ว และข้าพระองค์จะไม่นั่งกับคนชั่ว
word.spanish1909: Aborrecí la reunión de los malignos, Y con los impíos nunca me senté.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam abscondit me in tabernaculo suo ; in die malorum protexit me in abscondito tabernaculi sui.
word.italian1927: Io odio l’assemblea de’ malvagi, e non mi seggo con gli empi.
word.german1912: Ich hasse die Versammlung der Boshaften und sitze nicht bei den Gottlosen.
word.french1910: Je hais l'assemblée de ceux qui font le mal, Je ne m'assieds pas avec les méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我恨惡惡人的聚會，也不與作惡的同坐。
word.korean: 내가 행악자의 집회를 미워하오니 악한 자와 같이 앉지 아니하리이다
word.tagalog: Aking pinagtataniman ang kapisanan ng mga manggagawa ng kasamaan, at hindi ako uupo na kaumpok ng masama.
word.maori: Kino tonu ahau ki te whakaminenga o nga kaimahi i te he, e kore ano ahau e noho tahi ki te hunga kino.
word.cebuano: Gidumtan ko ang katilingban sa mga mamumuhat sa dautan, Ug ako dili molingkod uban sa mga tawong dautan.
word.hebrew: ה  שנאתי קהל מרעים    ועם-רשעים לא אשב
word.hebrewmodern: שנאתי קהל מרעים ועם רשעים לא אשב׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἔκρυψέν με ἐν σκηνῇ ἐν ἡμέρᾳ κακῶν μου ἐσκέπασέν με ἐν ἀποκρύφῳ τῆς σκηνῆς αὐτοῦ ἐν πέτρᾳ ὕψωσέν με

word.kjv: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
word.thailand: จงระวังลิ้นของเจ้าจากความชั่ว และอย่าให้ริมฝีปากพูดเป็นอุบายล่อลวง
word.spanish1909: Guarda tu lengua de mal, Y tus labios de hablar engaño.
word.latinvulgate: Ego autem, cum mihi molesti essent, induebar cilicio ; humiliabam in jejunio animam meam, et oratio mea in sinu meo convertetur.
word.italian1927: Guarda la tua lingua dal male a le tue labbra dal parlar con frode.
word.german1912: Behüte deine Zunge vor Bösem und deine Lippen, daß sie nicht Trug reden.
word.french1910: Préserve ta langue du mal, Et tes lèvres des paroles trompeuses;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 就要禁止舌頭不出惡言，嘴唇不說詭詐的話；
word.korean: 네 혀를 악에서 금하며 네 입술을 궤사한 말에서 금할지어다
word.tagalog: Ingatan mo ang iyong dila mula sa masama. At ang iyong mga labi sa pagsasalita ng karayaan.
word.maori: Tiakina tou arero kei kino, ou ngutu kei korero hianga.
word.cebuano: Bantayi ang imong dila gikan sa dautan, Ug ang imong ngabil gikan sa pagsulti ug limbong.
word.hebrew: יג  מי-האיש החפץ חיים    אהב ימים לראות טוב
word.hebrewmodern: נצר לשונך מרע ושפתיך מדבר מרמה׃
word.greekot: ἐγὼ δὲ ἐν τῷ αὐτοὺς παρενοχλεῖν μοι ἐνεδυόμην σάκκον καὶ ἐταπείνουν ἐν νηστείᾳ τὴν ψυχήν μου καὶ ἡ προσευχή μου εἰς κόλπον μου ἀποστραφήσεται

word.kjv: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
word.thailand: จงหนีความชั่ว และกระทำความดี แสวงหาความสงบสุขและดำเนินตามนั้น
word.spanish1909: Apártate del mal, y haz el bien; Busca la paz, y síguela.
word.latinvulgate: Quasi proximum et quasi fratrem nostrum sic complacebam ; quasi lugens et contristatus sic humiliabar.
word.italian1927: Dipartiti dal male e fa’ il bene; cerca la pace, e procacciala.
word.german1912: Laß vom Bösen und tue Gutes; suche Frieden und jage ihm nach.
word.french1910: Eloigne-toi du mal, et fais le bien; Recherche et poursuis la paix.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 也要離惡行善，尋找並追求和睦。
word.korean: 악을 버리고 선을 행하며 화평을 찾아 따를지어다
word.tagalog: Lumayo ka sa kasamaan, at gumawa ka ng mabuti; hanapin mo ang kapayapaan at habulin mo.
word.maori: Mawehe atu i te kino, mahia te pai; rapua te ata noho, whaia hoki.
word.cebuano: Pahalayo ka gikan sa dautan, ug buhaton mo ang maayo; Pangitaon mo ang pakigdait, ug sundon mo kini.
word.hebrew: יד  נצר לשונך מרע    ושפתיך מדבר מרמה
word.hebrewmodern: סור מרע ועשה טוב בקש שלום ורדפהו׃
word.greekot: ὡς πλησίον ὡς ἀδελφὸν ἡμέτερον οὕτως εὐηρέστουν ὡς πενθῶν καὶ σκυθρωπάζων οὕτως ἐταπεινούμην

word.kjv: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
word.thailand: พระพักตร์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ตั้งต่อสู้กับคนทั้งหลายที่ทำความชั่ว เพื่อจะตัดการระลึกถึงเขาเสียจากแผ่นดินโลก
word.spanish1909: La ira de Jehová contra los que mal hacen, Para cortar de la tierra la memoria de ellos.
word.latinvulgate: Dissipati sunt, nec compuncti, tentaverunt me, subsannaverunt me subsannatione ; frenduerunt super me dentibus suis.
word.italian1927: La faccia dell’Eterno è contro quelli che fanno il male per sterminare di sulla terra la loro memoria.
word.german1912: das Antlitz aber des HERRN steht gegen die, so Böses tun, daß er ihr Gedächtnis ausrotte von der Erde.
word.french1910: L'Eternel tourne sa face contre les méchants, Pour retrancher de la terre leur souvenir.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的臉敵對作惡的人，要把他們的名從世上除掉。
word.korean: 여호와의 얼굴은 행악하는 자를 대하사 저희의 자취를 땅에서 끊으려 하시는도다
word.tagalog: Ang mukha ng Panginoon ay laban sa kanila na nagsisigawa ng kasamaan, upang ihiwalay ang alaala sa kanila sa lupa.
word.maori: E he ana te mata o Ihowa ki nga kaimahi i te kino, hei hatepe i a ratou i te whenua kei maharatia.
word.cebuano: Ang nawong ni Jehova batok sa mga nagabuhat ug dautan, Aron sa pagputol sa handumanan nila gikan sa yuta.
word.hebrew: טז  עיני יהוה אל-צדיקים    ואזניו אל-שועתם
word.hebrewmodern: פני יהוה בעשי רע להכרית מארץ זכרם׃
word.greekot: ἐπείρασάν με ἐξεμυκτήρισάν με μυκτηρισμόν ἔβρυξαν ἐπ' ἐμὲ τοὺς ὀδόντας αὐτῶν

word.kjv: They rewarded me evil for good to the spoiling of my soul.
word.thailand: เขาสนองข้าพระองค์โดยทำชั่วตอบความดี จิตใจของข้าพระองค์ก็ตรมตรอม
word.spanish1909: Volviéronme mal por bien, Para abatir á mi alma.
word.latinvulgate: Non veniat mihi pes superbiæ, et manus peccatoris non moveat me.
word.italian1927: Mi rendono male per bene; derelitta è l’anima mia.
word.german1912: Sie tun mir Arges um Gutes, mich in Herzeleid zu bringen.
word.french1910: Ils me rendent le mal pour le bien: Mon âme est dans l'abandon.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們對我以惡報善，使我孤苦無依。
word.korean: 내게 선을 악으로 갚아 나의 영혼을 외롭게 하나
word.tagalog: Iginaganti nila sa akin ay kasamaan sa mabuti, sa pagpapaulila ng aking kaluluwa.
word.maori: Utua ana e ratou taku pai ki te kino, a whakatupu pani ana toku wairua.
word.cebuano: Gibalusan nila ako ug dautan tungod sa maayo, Aron sa pagpaguol sa akong kalag.
word.hebrew: יב  ישלמוני רעה תחת טובה    שכול לנפשי
word.hebrewmodern: ישלמוני רעה תחת טובה שכול לנפשי׃
word.greekot: μὴ ἐλθέτω μοι ποὺς ὑπερηφανίας καὶ χεὶρ ἁμαρτωλῶν μὴ σαλεύσαι με

word.kjv: He deviseth mischief upon his bed; he setteth himself in a way that is not good; he abhorreth not evil.
word.thailand: เขาปองความชั่วร้ายเมื่อเขาอยู่บนที่นอนของเขา เขาวางตัวในทางที่ไม่ดี เขามิได้เกลียดชังความชั่ว
word.spanish1909: Iniquidad piensa sobre su cama; Está en camino no bueno, El mal no aborrece.
word.latinvulgate: Delectare in Domino, et dabit tibi petitiones cordis tui.
word.italian1927: Egli medita iniquità sopra il suo letto; si tiene nella via che non è buona; non aborre il male.
word.german1912: sondern sie trachten auf ihrem Lager nach Schaden und stehen fest auf dem bösen Weg und scheuen kein Arges.
word.french1910: Il médite l'injustice sur sa couche, Il se tient sur une voie qui n'est pas bonne, Il ne repousse pas le mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他在床上密謀作惡，定意行在不善的道路上，並不棄絕惡事。
word.korean: 저는 그 침상에서 죄악을 꾀하며 스스로 불선한 길에 서고 악을 싫어하지 아니하는도다
word.tagalog: Siya'y kumakatha ng kasamaan sa kaniyang higaan; siya'y lumagay sa isang daan na hindi mabuti; hindi niya kinayayamutan ang kasamaan.
word.maori: He mahi nanakia tana e whakaaro ai i runga i tona moenga; ehara i te pai te ara e turia ana e ia, kahore ona whakarihariha ki te kino.
word.cebuano: Sa iyang higdaanan nagalalang siya ug kadautan; Nagapahamutang siya sa usa ka dalan nga dili maayo; Ug sa dautan wala siya magadumot.
word.hebrew: ד  דברי-פיו און ומרמה    חדל להשכיל להיטיב
word.hebrewmodern: און יחשב על משכבו יתיצב על דרך לא טוב רע לא ימאס׃
word.greekot: κατατρύφησον τοῦ κυρίου καὶ δώσει σοι τὰ αἰτήματα τῆς καρδίας σου

word.kjv: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.
word.thailand: อย่าให้เจ้าเดือดร้อนเพราะเหตุคนที่กระทำชั่ว อย่าอิจฉาคนที่กระทำความชั่วช้า
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. NO te impacientes á causa de los malignos, Ni tengas envidia de los que hacen iniquidad.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus David, in rememorationem de sabbato.
word.italian1927: Di Davide. Non ti crucciare a cagion de’ malvagi; non portare invidia a quelli che operano perversamente;
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids. Erzürne dich nicht über die Bösen; sei nicht neidisch auf die Übeltäter.
word.french1910: De David. Ne t'irrite pas contre les méchants, N'envie pas ceux qui font le mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。不要因作惡的人心懷不平，不要因犯罪的人產生嫉妒。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 행악자를 인하여 불평하여 하지 말며 불의를 행하는 자를 투기하지 말지어다
word.tagalog: Huwag kang mabalisa dahil sa mga manggagawa ng kasamaan, ni managhili ka man sa kanila na nagsisigawa ng kalikuan.
word.maori: ¶ Na Rawiri. Kaua e mamae ki te hunga kino, kaua e hae ki nga kaimahi i te he.
word.cebuano: Dili ka magkaguol tungod sa mga mamumuhat sa dautan, Ni masina ikaw batok niadtong mga nagabuhat ug dilimatarung.
word.hebrew: א  לדוד  אל-תתחר במרעים    אל-תקנא בעשי עולה
word.hebrewmodern: לדוד אל תתחר במרעים אל תקנא בעשי עולה׃
word.greekot: ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ εἰς ἀνάμνησιν περὶ σαββάτου

word.kjv: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.
word.thailand: จงระงับความโกรธ และทิ้งความพิโรธ อย่าให้ใจเดือดร้อนของท่านนำท่านไปกระทำชั่ว
word.spanish1909: Déjate de la ira, y depón el enojo: No te excites en manera alguna á hacer lo malo.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam lumbi mei impleti sunt illusionibus, et non est sanitas in carne mea.
word.italian1927: Cessa dall’ira e lascia lo sdegno; non crucciarti; ciò non conduce che al mal fare.
word.german1912: Steh ab vom Zorn und laß den Grimm, erzürne dich nicht, daß du nicht auch übel tust.
word.french1910: Laisse la colère, abandonne la fureur; Ne t'irrite pas, ce serait mal faire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要抑制怒氣，消除烈怒；不要心懷不平，那只會導致你作惡。
word.korean: 분을 그치고 노를 버리라 불평하여 말라 행악에 치우칠 뿐이라
word.tagalog: Maglikat ka ng pagkagalit, at bayaan mo ang poot: huwag kang mabalisa, iya'y maghahatid lamang sa paggawa ng kasamaan.
word.maori: Kati te riri, whakarerea hoki te arita; kei mamae koe, kei takina kia mahi i te kino.
word.cebuano: Biyaan mo ang kasuko, ug ayran mo ang kaligutgut: Dili ka makaguol, kay kana nagapaingon ngadto sa buhat nga dautan.
word.hebrew: ח  הרף מאף ועזב חמה    אל-תתחר אך-להרע
word.hebrewmodern: הרף מאף ועזב חמה אל תתחר אך להרע׃
word.greekot: ὅτι αἱ ψύαι μου ἐπλήσθησαν ἐμπαιγμῶν καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν ἴασις ἐν τῇ σαρκί μου

word.kjv: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the LORD, they shall inherit the earth.
word.thailand: เพราะคนที่กระทำชั่วจะถูกตัดออกไป แต่คนเหล่านั้นที่รอคอยพระเยโฮวาห์จะได้แผ่นดินโลกเป็นมรดก
word.spanish1909: Porque los malignos serán talados, Mas los que esperan en Jehová, ellos heredarán la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Afflictus sum, et humiliatus sum nimis ; rugiebam a gemitu cordis mei.
word.italian1927: Poiché i malvagi saranno sterminati; ma quelli che sperano nell’Eterno possederanno la terra.
word.german1912: Denn die Bösen werden ausgerottet; die aber des HERRN harren, werden das Land erben.
word.french1910: Car les méchants seront retranchés, Et ceux qui espèrent en l'Eternel posséderont le pays.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為作惡的必被剪除，但等候耶和華的必承受地土。
word.korean: 대저 행악하는 자는 끊어질 것이나 여호와를 기대하는 자는 땅을 차지하리로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang mga manggagawa ng kasamaan ay mangahihiwalay: nguni't yaong nagsipaghintay sa Panginoon, ay mangagmamana sila ng lupain.
word.maori: No te mea ka hatepea atu te hunga kino: ko te hunga ia e tatari ana ki a Ihowa, ka riro i a ratou te whenua.
word.cebuano: Kay ang mga mamumuhat sa dautan pagalaglagon; Apan ang mga nagahulat kang Jehova, sila magapanunod sa yuta.
word.hebrew: ט  כי-מרעים יכרתון    וקוי יהוה המה יירשו-ארץ
word.hebrewmodern: כי מרעים יכרתון וקוי יהוה המה יירשו ארץ׃
word.greekot: ἐκακώθην καὶ ἐταπεινώθην ἕως σφόδρα ὠρυόμην ἀπὸ στεναγμοῦ τῆς καρδίας μου

word.kjv: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.
word.thailand: เขาจะไม่ได้อายในยามชั่วร้าย ในวันกันดารเขาจะอิ่มใจ
word.spanish1909: No serán avergonzados en el mal tiempo; Y en los días de hambre serán hartos.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam iniquitatem meam annuntiabo, et cogitabo pro peccato meo.
word.italian1927: Essi non saran confusi nel tempo dell’avversità, e saranno saziati nel tempo dalla fame.
word.german1912: Sie werden nicht zu Schanden in der bösen Zeit, und in der Teuerung werden sie genug haben.
word.french1910: Ils ne sont pas confondus au temps du malheur, Et ils sont rassasiés aux jours de la famine.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在患難的時候，他們必不蒙羞；在饑荒的日子，他們必得飽足。
word.korean: 저희는 환난 때에 부끄럽지 아니하며 기근의 날에도 풍족하려니와
word.tagalog: Hindi sila mangapapahiya sa panahon ng kasamaan: at sa mga kaarawan ng kagutom ay mangabubusog sila.
word.maori: E kore ratou e whakama i te wa o te he, ka makona ano ratou i nga ra o te hemokai.
word.cebuano: Dili sila maulawan sa panahon nga dautan; Ug sa mga adlaw sa gutom pagabusgon sila.
word.hebrew: יט  לא-יבשו בעת רעה    ובימי רעבון ישבעו
word.hebrewmodern: לא יבשו בעת רעה ובימי רעבון ישבעו׃
word.greekot: ὅτι τὴν ἀνομίαν μου ἐγὼ ἀναγγελῶ καὶ μεριμνήσω ὑπὲρ τῆς ἁμαρτίας μου

word.kjv: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.
word.thailand: จงพรากเสียจากการชั่ว และกระทำความดี และท่านจะดำรงอยู่เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Apártate del mal, y haz el bien, Y vivirás para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ritraiti dal male e fa’ il bene, e dimorerai nel paese in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Laß vom Bösen und tue Gutes und bleibe wohnen immerdar.
word.french1910: Détourne-toi du mal, fais le bien, Et possède à jamais ta demeure.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 應當離惡行善，你就可以永遠安居。
word.korean: 악에서 떠나 선을 행하라 ! 그리하면 영영히 거하리니
word.tagalog: Ikaw ay humiwalay sa kasamaan, at gumawa ka ng mabuti; at manahan ka magpakailan man.
word.maori: Whakarerea te kino, mahia te pai, ka noho tonu ai.
word.cebuano: Pahalayo ka sa dautan, ug buhuta ang maayo; Ug magpuyo ka sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: כז  סור מרע ועשה-טוב    ושכן לעולם
word.hebrewmodern: סור מרע ועשה טוב ושכן לעולם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.
word.thailand: บรรดาผู้ที่กระทำชั่วแก่ข้าพระองค์ตอบแทนความดี เป็นปฏิปักษ์ของข้าพระองค์ เพราะข้าพระองค์ติดตามความดี
word.spanish1909: Y pagando mal por bien Me son contrarios, por seguir yo lo bueno.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Anche quelli che mi rendon male per bene sono miei avversari, perché seguo il bene.
word.german1912: Und die mir Arges tun um Gutes, setzen sich wider mich, darum daß ich an dem Guten halte.
word.french1910: Ils me rendent le mal pour le bien; Ils sont mes adversaires, parce que je recherche le bien.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那些以惡報善的都與我作對，因為我追求良善。
word.korean: 여호와여, 나를 버리지 마소서 나의 하나님이여, 나를 멀리하지 마소서
word.tagalog: Sila namang nangagbabayad ng kasamaan sa mabuti ay mga kaaway ko, sapagka't aking sinunod ang bagay na mabuti.
word.maori: He hoariri ano ki ahau te hunga e utu ana i te pai ki te kino: moku e whai ana i te pai.
word.cebuano: Sila usab nga nanagbayad ug dautan sa maayo Mga kabatok nako, tungod kay nagasunod man ako sa butang nga maayo.
word.hebrew: כ  ואיבי חיים עצמו    ורבו שנאי שקר
word.hebrewmodern: ומשלמי רעה תחת טובה ישטנוני תחת רדופי טוב׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.
word.thailand: เพราะความชั่วได้ล้อมข้าพระองค์ไว้อย่างนับไม่ถ้วน ความชั่วช้าของข้าพระองค์ตามทันข้าพระองค์ จนข้าพระองค์มองอะไรไม่เห็น มันมากกว่าเส้นผมบนศีรษะข้าพระองค์ จิตใจของข้าพระองค์ก็ฝ่อไป
word.spanish1909: Porque me han cercado males hasta no haber cuento: Hanme comprendido mis maldades, y no puedo levantar la vista: Hanse aumentado más que los cabellos de mi cabeza, y mi corazón me falta.
word.latinvulgate: In hoc cognovi quoniam voluisti me, quoniam non gaudebit inimicus meus super me.
word.italian1927: Poiché mali innumerevoli mi circondano; le mie iniquità m’hanno raggiunto, e non posso abbracciarle con lo sguardo. Sono in maggior numero de’ capelli del mio capo, e il mio cuore vien meno!
word.german1912: Denn es hat mich umgeben Leiden ohne Zahl; es haben mich meine Sünden ergriffen, daß ich nicht sehen kann; ihrer ist mehr denn der Haare auf meinem Haupt, und mein Herz hat mich verlassen.
word.french1910: Car des maux sans nombre m'environnent; Les châtiments de mes iniquités m'atteignent, Et je ne puis en supporter la vue; Ils sont plus nombreux que les cheveux de ma tête, Et mon courage m'abandonne.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因有無數的禍患圍繞著我；我的罪孽追上了我，使我不能看見；它們比我的頭髮還多，以致我心驚膽戰。
word.korean: 무수한 재앙이 나를 둘러 싸고 나의 죄악이 내게 미치므로 우러러 볼 수도 없으며 죄가 나의 머리털보다 많으므로 내 마음이 사라졌음이니이다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kinulong ako ng walang bilang na kasamaan. Ang mga kasamaan ko ay umabot sa akin, na anopa't hindi ako makatingin; sila'y higit kay sa mga buhok ng aking ulo, at ang aking puso ay nagpalata sa akin.
word.maori: Ta te mea kua karapotia ahau e nga kino e kore e taea te tatau: mau pu ahau i oku kino, te ahei te titiro ake; he tini ke i nga makawe o toku matenga: a hemo iho toku ngakau.
word.cebuano: Kay dili maisip ang mga kadautan nga naglibut kanako; Ang akong mga kasal-anan nakaagpas kanako sa paagi nga dili na ako arang makayahat sa pagtan-aw; Daghan pa sila kay sa mga buhok sa akong ulo; Ug ang akong kasingkasing nagluya kanako.
word.hebrew: יב  אתה יהוה--    לא-תכלא רחמיך ממני חסדך ואמתך    תמיד יצרוני
word.hebrewmodern: כי אפפו עלי רעות עד אין מספר השיגוני עונתי ולא יכלתי לראות עצמו משערות ראשי ולבי עזבני׃
word.greekot: ἐν τούτῳ ἔγνων ὅτι τεθέληκάς με ὅτι οὐ μὴ ἐπιχαρῇ ὁ ἐχθρός μου ἐπ' ἐμέ

word.kjv: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil.
word.thailand: ขอให้ผู้ที่หาโอกาสทำลายชีวิตของข้าพระองค์ได้อายและเกิดความยุ่งเหยิงด้วยกัน ขอให้ผู้ปรารถนาสิ่งชั่วร้ายต่อข้าพระองค์นั้นต้องหันกลับไปและได้ความอัปยศ
word.spanish1909: Sean avergonzados y confusos á una Los que buscan mi vida para cortarla: Vuelvan atrás y avergüéncense Los que mi mal desean.
word.latinvulgate: Benedictus Dominus, Deus Israël, a sæculo, et usque in sæculum. Fiat, fiat.
word.italian1927: Siano confusi e svergognati tutti quanti quelli che cercano l’anima mia per farla perire! Voltin le spalle e siano coperti d’onta quelli che prendon piacere nel mio male!
word.german1912: Schämen müssen sich und zu Schanden werden, die mir nach meiner Seele stehen, daß sie die umbringen; zurück müssen sie fallen und zu Schanden werden, die mir Übles gönnen.
word.french1910: Que tous ensemble ils soient honteux et confus, Ceux qui en veulent à ma vie pour l'enlever! Qu'ils reculent et rougissent, Ceux qui désirent ma perte!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願那些尋找我，要毀滅我命的，一同抱愧蒙羞；願那些喜悅我遭害的，退後受辱。
word.korean: 나의 영혼을 찾아 멸하려 하는 자로 다 수치와 낭패를 당케 하시며 나의 해를 기뻐하는 자로 다 물러가 욕을 당케 하소서
word.tagalog: Sila'y mangapahiya nawa at mangatulig na magkakasama na nagsisiusig ng aking kaluluwa upang ipahamak: Sila nawa'y mangapaurong at mangadala sa kasiraang puri na nangalulugod sa aking kapahamakan.
word.maori: Kia whakama, kia pororaru ngatahi te hunga e rapu ana i toku wairua kia whakamatea: kia whakahokia ki muri, kia whakama te hunga e hiahia ana kia he ahau.
word.cebuano: Pakaulawi ug ipagubot sa tingub Ang mga nagapangita sa akong kinabuhi aron sa paglaglag niini: Pasiboga sila ug pakaulawi ang mga nagapanghinaut sa akong kadautan.
word.hebrew: יד  רצה יהוה להצילני    יהוה לעזרתי חושה
word.hebrewmodern: יבשו ויחפרו יחד מבקשי נפשי לספותה יסגו אחור ויכלמו חפצי רעתי׃
word.greekot: εὐλογητὸς κύριος ὁ θεὸς ισραηλ ἀπὸ τοῦ αἰῶνος καὶ εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα γένοιτο γένοιτο

word.kjv: Mine enemies speak evil of me, When shall he die, and his name perish?
word.thailand: ศัตรูของข้าพเจ้ากล่าวใส่ร้ายข้าพเจ้าว่า "เมื่อไรเขาจะตายนะ และชื่อของเขาจะได้พินาศ"
word.spanish1909: Mis enemigos dicen mal de mí preguntando: ¿Cuándo morirá, y perecerá su nombre?
word.latinvulgate: Hæc recordatus sum, et effudi in me animam meam, quoniam transibo in locum tabernaculi admirabilis, usque ad donum Dei, in voce exsultationis et confessionis, sonus epulantis.
word.italian1927: I miei nemici mi augurano del male, dicendo: Quando morrà? e quando perirà il suo nome?
word.german1912: Meine Feinde reden Arges gegen mich: "Wann wird er sterben und sein Name vergehen?"
word.french1910: Mes ennemis disent méchamment de moi: Quand mourra-t-il? quand périra son nom?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的仇敵用惡毒的話中傷我，說：“他甚麼時候死呢？他的名字甚麼時候消滅呢？”
word.korean: 나의 원수가 내게 대하여 악담하기를 저가 어느 때에나 죽고 그 이름이 언제나 멸망할꼬 하며
word.tagalog: Ang aking mga kaaway ay nangagsasalita ng kasamaan laban sa akin, na nangagsasabi, kailan siya mamamatay, at mapapawi ang kaniyang pangalan?
word.maori: ¶ He kino te korero a oku hoariri moku, e mea ana, A hea ranei ia mate ai, pirau ai tona ingoa?
word.cebuano: Ang akong mga kaaway nagapumulong ug dautan batok kanako, nga nagaingon : Anus-a ba siya mamatay, ug ma-hanaw ang iyang ngalan?
word.hebrew: ה  אני-אמרתי יהוה חנני    רפאה נפשי כי-חטאתי לך
word.hebrewmodern: אויבי יאמרו רע לי מתי ימות ואבד שמו׃
word.greekot: ταῦτα ἐμνήσθην καὶ ἐξέχεα ἐπ' ἐμὲ τὴν ψυχήν μου ὅτι διελεύσομαι ἐν τόπῳ σκηνῆς θαυμαστῆς ἕως τοῦ οἴκου τοῦ θεοῦ ἐν φωνῇ ἀγαλλιάσεως καὶ ἐξομολογήσεως ἤχου ἑορτάζοντος

word.kjv: An evil disease, say they, cleaveth fast unto him: and now that he lieth he shall rise up no more.
word.thailand: เขาทั้งหลายกล่าวว่า "โรคร้ายเข้าไปอยู่ในตัวเขาแล้ว เขาจะไม่ลุกไปจากที่ที่เขานอนนั้นอีก"
word.spanish1909: Cosa pestilencial de él se ha apoderado; Y el que cayó en cama, no volverá á levantarse.
word.latinvulgate: Abyssus abyssum invocat, in voce cataractarum tuarum ; omnia excelsa tua, et fluctus tui super me transierunt.
word.italian1927: Un male incurabile, essi dicono, gli s’è attaccato addosso; ed ora che giace, non si rileverà mai più.
word.german1912: Sie haben ein Bubenstück über mich beschlossen: "Wenn er liegt, soll er nicht wieder aufstehen."
word.french1910: Il est dangereusement atteint, Le voilà couché, il ne se relèvera pas!
word.chinesencvtraditional: “有惡疾臨到他身上；他既然躺下了，就必一病不起。”
word.korean: 이르기를 악한 병이 저에게 들었으니 이제 저가 눕고 다시 일지 못하리라 하오며
word.tagalog: Isang masamang sakit, wika nila, ay kumapit na madali sa kaniya; at ngayon siyang nahihiga ay hindi na babangon pa.
word.maori: E ai ta ratou, E piri ana te mate kino ki a ia; a ka takoto nei ia, heoi ano tona aranga ake.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka mangil-ad nga sakit, matud nila , motakud kaniya; Ug karon nga siya nagahigda na, dili na siya makabalik sa pagbangon.
word.hebrew: ח  יחד--עלי יתלחשו כל-שנאי    עלי--יחשבו רעה לי
word.hebrewmodern: דבר בליעל יצוק בו ואשר שכב לא יוסיף לקום׃
word.greekot: ἄβυσσος ἄβυσσον ἐπικαλεῖται εἰς φωνὴν τῶν καταρρακτῶν σου πάντες οἱ μετεωρισμοί σου καὶ τὰ κύματά σου ἐπ' ἐμὲ διῆλθον

word.kjv: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil, when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about?
word.thailand: ทำไมข้าพเจ้าจึงกลัวในคราวทุกข์ยากลำบาก เมื่อความชั่วช้าแห่งผู้ข่มเหงล้อมตัวข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué he de temer en los días de adversidad, Cuando la iniquidad de mis insidiadores me cercare?
word.latinvulgate: Congregate illi sanctos ejus, qui ordinant testamentum ejus super sacrificia.
word.italian1927: Perché temerei ne’ giorni dell’avversità quando mi circonda l’iniquità dei miei insidiatori,
word.german1912: Warum sollte ich mich fürchten in bösen Tagen, wenn mich die Missetat meiner Untertreter umgibt,
word.french1910: Pourquoi craindrais-je aux jours du malheur, Lorsque l'iniquité de mes adversaires m'enveloppe?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在患難的日子，暗中迫害我的惡人圍繞我的時候，我何須懼怕呢？
word.korean: 죄악이 나를 따라 에우는 환난의 날에 내가 어찌 두려워하랴
word.tagalog: Bakit ako matatakot sa mga kaarawan ng kasamaan, pagka kinukulong ako ng kasamaan sa aking mga sakong?
word.maori: Kia wehi ahau ki te aha i nga ra o te kino, ina karapotia ahau e te kino kei oku rekereke?
word.cebuano: Busa ngano nga mahadlok ako sa mga adlaw sa kadautan, Sa diha nga ang kasal-anan nga ania sa akong tikod magalibut kanako?
word.hebrew: ה  אטה למשל אזני    אפתח בכנור חידתי
word.hebrewmodern: למה אירא בימי רע עון עקבי יסובני׃
word.greekot: συναγάγετε αὐτῷ τοὺς ὁσίους αὐτοῦ τοὺς διατιθεμένους τὴν διαθήκην αὐτοῦ ἐπὶ θυσίαις

word.kjv: Thou givest thy mouth to evil, and thy tongue frameth deceit.
word.thailand: เจ้าปล่อยปากของเจ้าให้พูดชั่ว และลิ้นของเจ้าประกอบการหลอกลวง
word.spanish1909: Tu boca metías en mal, Y tu lengua componía engaño.
word.latinvulgate: Sacrificium Deo spiritus contribulatus ; cor contritum et humiliatum, Deus, non despicies.
word.italian1927: Tu abbandoni la tua bocca al male, e la tua lingua intesse frodi.
word.german1912: Deinen Mund lässest du Böses reden, und deine Zunge treibt Falschheit.
word.french1910: Tu livres ta bouche au mal, Et ta langue est un tissu de tromperies.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你使你的口亂說壞話，使你的舌頭編造謊言。
word.korean: 네 입을 악에게 주고 네 혀로 궤사를 지으며
word.tagalog: Iyong ibinubuka ang iyong bibig sa kasamaan, at ang iyong dila ay kumakatha ng karayaan.
word.maori: Kua tukua e koe tou mangai ki te kino; a e tito hianga ana tou arero.
word.cebuano: Ang imong baba gitugyan mo sa kadautan, Ug ang imong dila nagalalang ug limbong.
word.hebrew: יט  פיך שלחת ברעה    ולשונך תצמיד מרמה
word.hebrewmodern: פיך שלחת ברעה ולשונך תצמיד מרמה׃
word.greekot: θυσία τῷ θεῷ πνεῦμα συντετριμμένον καρδίαν συντετριμμένην καὶ τεταπεινωμένην ὁ θεὸς οὐκ ἐξουθενώσει

word.kjv: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์ได้ทำบาปต่อพระองค์ ต่อพระองค์เท่านั้น และได้กระทำสิ่งที่ชั่วร้ายในสายพระเนตรพระองค์ ทั้งนี้เพื่อพระองค์จะทรงชอบธรรมในคำตรัสของพระองค์ และกระจ่างแจ้งในการพิพากษาของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: A ti, á ti solo he pecado, Y he hecho lo malo delante de tus ojos: Porque seas reconocido justo en tu palabra, Y tenido por puro en tu juicio.
word.latinvulgate: Tota die injustitiam cogitavit lingua tua ; sicut novacula acuta fecisti dolum.
word.italian1927: Io ho peccato contro te, contro te solo, e ho fatto ciò ch’è male agli occhi tuoi; lo confesso, affinché tu sia riconosciuto giusto quando parli, e irreprensibile quando giudichi.
word.german1912: An dir allein habe ich gesündigt und übel vor dir getan, auf daß du recht behaltest in deinen Worten und rein bleibest, wenn du gerichtet wirst.
word.french1910: J'ai péché contre toi seul, Et j'ai fait ce qui est mal à tes yeux, En sorte que tu seras juste dans ta sentence, Sans reproche dans ton jugement.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我得罪了你，唯獨得罪你；我行了你眼中看為惡的事，因此，你宣判的時候，顯為公義；你審判的時候，顯為清正。
word.korean: 내가 주께만 범죄하여 주의 목전에 악을 행하였사오니 주께서 말씀하실 때에 의로우시다 하고 판단하실 때에 순전하시다 하리이다
word.tagalog: Laban sa iyo, sa iyo lamang ako nagkasala, at nakagawa ng kasamaan sa iyong paningin: upang ikaw ay ariing ganap pag nagsasalita ka, at maging malinis pag humahatol ka.
word.maori: He hara ki a koe, ki a koe anake, toku; i meatia ano tenei he ki tou aroaro; kia tika ai koe i tau korerotanga, kia ma ai hoki ina whakawa.
word.cebuano: Batok kanimo, kanimo lamang, nakasala ako, Ug nabuhat ko ang dautan sa imong pagtan-aw; Aron ikaw pagailhon nga matarung sa diha nga ikaw magasulti, Ug pagailhon nga ulay sa diha nga ikaw magahukom.
word.hebrew: ד  הרבה (הרב) כבסני מעוני    ומחטאתי טהרני
word.hebrewmodern: לך לבדך חטאתי והרע בעיניך עשיתי למען תצדק בדברך תזכה בשפטך׃
word.greekot: ἀδικίαν ἐλογίσατο ἡ γλῶσσά σου ὡσεὶ ξυρὸν ἠκονημένον ἐποίησας δόλον

word.kjv: Thou lovest evil more than good; and lying rather than to speak righteousness. Selah.
word.thailand: เจ้ารักชั่วมากกว่าดี และการมุสามากกว่าพูดความชอบธรรม เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Amaste el mal más que el bien; La mentira más que hablar justicia. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: Deus de cælo prospexit super filios hominum, ut videat si est intelligens, aut requirens Deum.
word.italian1927: Tu ami il male più che il bene, e la menzogna più che il parlar secondo giustizia. Sela.
word.german1912: Du redest lieber Böses denn Gutes, und Falsches denn Rechtes. (Sela.
word.french1910: Tu aimes le mal plutôt que le bien, Le mensonge plutôt que la droiture. -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你喜愛作惡過於行善，喜愛撒謊過於說實話。（細拉）
word.korean: 네가 선보다 악을 사랑하며 의를 말함보다 거짓을 사랑하는도다 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Iniibig mo ang kasamaan ng higit kay sa kabutihan; at ang pagsisinungaling kay sa pagsasalita ng katuwiran. (Selah)
word.maori: E arohaina rawatia ana e koe te kino i te pai, te teka i te korero tika. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Gihigugma mo ang dautan labaw kay sa maayo, Ug ang kabakakan, labaw kay sa pagsulti sa pagkamatarung. (Selah
word.hebrew: ג  מה-תתהלל ברעה הגבור    חסד אל כל-היום
word.hebrewmodern: אהבת רע מטוב שקר מדבר צדק סלה׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς ἐκ τοῦ οὐρανοῦ διέκυψεν ἐπὶ τοὺς υἱοὺς τῶν ἀνθρώπων τοῦ ἰδεῖν εἰ ἔστιν συνίων ἢ ἐκζητῶν τὸν θεόν

word.kjv: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงตอบสนองการร้ายต่อพวกศัตรูของข้าพเจ้าและทรงขจัดเขาเสียด้วยความจริงของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: El volverá el mal á mis enemigos: Córtalos por tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Cor meum conturbatum est in me, et formido mortis cecidit super me.
word.italian1927: Egli farà ricadere il male sopra i miei nemici. Nella tua fedeltà, distruggili!
word.german1912: Er wird die Bosheit meinen Feinden bezahlen. Verstöre sie durch deine Treue!
word.french1910: Le mal retombera sur mes adversaires; Anéantis-les, dans ta fidélité!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願災禍報應在我仇敵的身上；願你因你的信實消滅他們。
word.korean: 주께서 내 원수에게 악으로 갚으시리니 주의 성실하심으로 저희를 멸하소서
word.tagalog: Kaniyang ibabalik ang kasamaan sa aking mga kaaway: gibain mo sila sa iyong katotohanan.
word.maori: Mana e utu te kino o oku hoariri: huna ratou, he pono nei hoki koe.
word.cebuano: Panimaslan niya ang dautan sa akong mga kaaway: Laglagon mo sila tungod sa imong kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: ה  כי זרים קמו עלי--    ועריצים בקשו נפשי לא שמו אלהים לנגדם    סלה
word.hebrewmodern: ישוב הרע לשררי באמתך הצמיתם׃
word.greekot: ἡ καρδία μου ἐταράχθη ἐν ἐμοί καὶ δειλία θανάτου ἐπέπεσεν ἐπ' ἐμέ

word.kjv: Every day they wrest my words: all their thoughts are against me for evil.
word.thailand: เขาประทุษร้ายต่อคำกล่าวของข้าพระองค์วันยังค่ำ ความคิดทั้งสิ้นของเขาล้วนมุ่งร้ายต่อข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Todos los días me contristan mis negocios; Contra mí son todos sus pensamientos para mal.
word.latinvulgate: et eripuit animam meam de medio catulorum leonum ; dormivi conturbatus. Filii hominum dentes eorum arma et sagittæ, et lingua eorum gladius acutus.
word.italian1927: Torcon del continuo le mie parole; tutti i lor pensieri son vòlti a farmi del male.
word.german1912: Täglich fechten sie meine Worte an; all ihre Gedanken sind, daß sie mir Übel tun.
word.french1910: Sans cesse ils portent atteinte à mes droits, Ils n'ont à mon égard que de mauvaises pensées.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們終日歪曲我的話，常常設計謀陷害我。
word.korean: 저희가 종일 내 말을 곡해하며 내게 대한 저희 모든 사상은 사악이라
word.tagalog: Buong araw ay binabaligtad nila ang aking mga salita: lahat ng kanilang mga pagiisip ay laban sa akin sa ikasasama.
word.maori: E whakariroia ketia ana e ratou aku kupu i nga ra katoa; heoi ano ta ratou e whakaaro ai ko te kino moku.
word.cebuano: Sa tibook nga adlaw ginabalit-ad nila ang akong mga pulong: Ang tanan nilang mga hunahuna batok kanako alang sa kadautan.
word.hebrew: ה  באלהים    אהלל דברו באלהים בטחתי לא אירא    מה-יעשה בשר לי
word.hebrewmodern: כל היום דברי יעצבו עלי כל מחשבתם לרע׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐρρύσατο τὴν ψυχήν μου ἐκ μέσου σκύμνων ἐκοιμήθην τεταραγμένος υἱοὶ ἀνθρώπων οἱ ὀδόντες αὐτῶν ὅπλον καὶ βέλη καὶ ἡ γλῶσσα αὐτῶν μάχαιρα ὀξεῖα

word.kjv: They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them?
word.thailand: เขายึดจุดประสงค์ชั่วของเขาไว้มั่น เขาพูดถึงการวางกับดักอย่างลับๆ คิดว่า "ใครจะเห็นเขาทั้งหลายได้"
word.spanish1909: Obstinados en su inicuo designio, Tratan de esconder los lazos, Y dicen: ¿Quién los ha de ver?
word.latinvulgate: Beatus quem elegisti et assumpsisti : inhabitabit in atriis tuis. Replebimur in bonis domus tuæ ; sanctum est templum tuum,
word.italian1927: S’incoraggiano a vicenda in un’impresa malvagia; concertano di tender lacci di nascosto; e dicono: Chi li vedrà?
word.german1912: Sie sind kühn mit ihren bösen Anschlägen und sagen, wie sie Stricke legen wollen, und sprechen: Wer kann sie sehen?
word.french1910: Ils se fortifient dans leur méchanceté: Ils se concertent pour tendre des pièges, Ils disent: Qui les verra?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們彼此鼓勵，設下惡計，商議暗設網羅，說：“誰能看見它們呢？”
word.korean: 저희는 악한 목적으로 서로 장려하며 비밀히 올무 놓기를 함께 의논하고 하는 말이 누가 보리요 하며
word.tagalog: Sila'y nagpapakatapang sa masamang akala; sila'y nagsasangusapan ng paglalagay ng lihim na silo; Sinasabi nila, Sinong makakakita?
word.maori: E whakamaia ana ratou i a ratou ano ki te mea kino; e runanga ana kia whakatakotoria pukutia he rore, e mea ana, Ko wai e kite i a ratou?
word.cebuano: Nanagdasig sila sa ilang kaugalingon sa usa ka dautan nga tuyo; Nanagsabut sila sa pagbutang ug mga lit-ag sa tago; Ug sila moingon: Kinsa man ang makakita kanila?
word.hebrew: ה  לירת במסתרים תם    פתאם ירהו ולא ייראו
word.hebrewmodern: יחזקו למו דבר רע יספרו לטמון מוקשים אמרו מי יראה למו׃
word.greekot: μακάριος ὃν ἐξελέξω καὶ προσελάβου κατασκηνώσει ἐν ταῖς αὐλαῖς σου πλησθησόμεθα ἐν τοῖς ἀγαθοῖς τοῦ οἴκου σου ἅγιος ὁ ναός σου θαυμαστὸς ἐν δικαιοσύνῃ

word.kjv: He cast upon them the fierceness of his anger, wrath, and indignation, and trouble, by sending evil angels among them.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงปล่อยความกริ้วดุร้ายของพระองค์มาเหนือเขา ทั้งพระพิโรธ ความกริ้วและความทุกข์ลำบาก โดยส่งเหล่าทูตสวรรค์ชั่วร้ายท่ามกลางเขา
word.spanish1909: Envió sobre ellos el furor de su saña, Ira y enojo y angustia, Con misión de malos ángeles.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Scatenò su loro l’ardore del suo cruccio, ira, indignazione e distretta, una torma di messaggeri di malanni.
word.german1912: da er böse Engel unter sie sandte in seinem grimmigen Zorn und ließ sie toben und wüten und Leid tun;
word.french1910: Il lança contre eux son ardente colère, La fureur, la rage et la détresse, Une troupe de messagers de malheur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他使猛烈的怒氣、忿怒、憤恨、患難，好像一群降災的使者，臨到他們中間。
word.korean: 그 맹렬한 노와 분과 분노와 고난 곧 벌하는 사자들을 저희에게 내려 보내셨으며
word.tagalog: Ibinugso niya sa kanila ang kabangisan ng kaniyang galit, poot at galit, at kabagabagan, pulutong ng mga anghel ng kasamaan.
word.maori: I tukua whakareretia e ia ki a ratou tona riri, aritarita, weriweri, me te raruraru; he whakaeke na nga anahera kino.
word.cebuano: Iyang gipadala sa ibabaw nila ang kabangis sa iyang kaligutgut, Kasuko, ug kapungot, ug kasamok, Usa ka panon sa mga manolonda nga dautan.
word.hebrew: מט  ישלח-בם חרון אפו--עברה וזעם וצרה    משלחת מלאכי רעים
word.hebrewmodern: ישלח בם חרון אפו עברה וזעם וצרה משלחת מלאכי רעים׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us, and the years wherein we have seen evil.
word.thailand: ขอทรงให้ข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายยินดีให้มากวันเท่ากับที่พระองค์ได้ทรงให้ข้าพระองค์ทุกข์ยากนั้น และให้มากปีเท่ากับที่ข้าพระองค์ได้ประสบการร้าย
word.spanish1909: Alégranos conforme á los días que nos afligiste, Y los años que vimos mal.
word.latinvulgate: Clamabit ad me, et ego exaudiam eum ; cum ipso sum in tribulatione ; eripiam eum, et glorificabo eum.
word.italian1927: Rallegraci in proporzione de’ giorni che ci hai afflitti, e degli anni che abbiam sentito il male.
word.german1912: Erfreue uns nun wieder, nachdem du uns so lange plagest, nachdem wir so lange Unglück leiden.
word.french1910: Réjouis-nous autant de jours que tu nous as humiliés, Autant d'années que nous avons vu le malheur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你使我們受苦和遭難的年日有多久，求你使我們喜樂的日子也有多久。
word.korean: 우리를 곤고케 하신 날수대로와 우리의 화를 당한 연수대로 기쁘게 하소서
word.tagalog: Pasayahin mo kami ayon sa mga kaarawan na iyong idinalamhati sa amin, at sa mga taon na aming ikinakita ng kasamaan.
word.maori: Whakaharitia matou, kia rite ki nga ra i whakawhiua ai matou e koe, ki nga tau i kite ai matou i te kino.
word.cebuano: Lipaya kami sumala sa mga adlaw nga ikaw nagsakit kanamo, Ug sa katuigan nga kami nakakita sa kadautan.
word.hebrew: טו  שמחנו כימות עניתנו    שנות ראינו רעה
word.hebrewmodern: שמחנו כימות עניתנו שנות ראינו רעה׃
word.greekot: ἐπικαλέσεταί με καὶ εἰσακούσομαι αὐτοῦ μετ' αὐτοῦ εἰμι ἐν θλίψει καὶ ἐξελοῦμαι καὶ δοξάσω αὐτόν

word.kjv: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
word.thailand: ไม่มีการร้ายใดๆจะตกมาบนท่าน ไม่มีภัยมาใกล้ที่อาศัยของท่าน
word.spanish1909: No te sobrevendrá mal, Ni plaga tocará tu morada.
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam ecce inimici tui, Domine, quoniam ecce inimici tui peribunt ; et dispergentur omnes qui operantur iniquitatem.
word.italian1927: male alcuno non ti coglierà, né piaga alcuna s’accosterà alla tua tenda.
word.german1912: Es wird dir kein Übel begegnen, und keine Plage wird zu deiner Hütte sich nahen.
word.french1910: Aucun malheur ne t'arrivera, Aucun fléau n'approchera de ta tente.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 禍患必不臨到你，災害必不臨近你的帳棚。
word.korean: 화가 네게 미치지 못하며 재앙이 네 장막에 가까이 오지 못하리니
word.tagalog: Walang kasamaang mangyayari sa iyo, ni anomang salot ay lalapit sa iyong tolda.
word.maori: Kahore he kino e pa ki a koe, kahore ano he whiu e tata ki tou teneti.
word.cebuano: Dili moabut kanimo ang kadautan, Ni magapahaduol ang kamatay sa imong balong-balong.
word.hebrew: י  לא-תאנה אליך רעה    ונגע לא-יקרב באהלך
word.hebrewmodern: לא תאנה אליך רעה ונגע לא יקרב באהלך׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἰδοὺ οἱ ἐχθροί σου ἀπολοῦνται καὶ διασκορπισθήσονται πάντες οἱ ἐργαζόμενοι τὴν ἀνομίαν

word.kjv: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?
word.thailand: ผู้ใดจะลุกขึ้นต่อต้านคนกระทำความชั่วแทนข้าพเจ้า ผู้ใดจะยืนต่อสู้คนกระทำความชั่วช้าแทนข้าพเจ้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién se levantará por mí contra los malignos? ¿Quién estará por mí contra los que obran iniquidad?
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Chi si leverà per me contro i malvagi? Chi si presenterà per me contro gli operatori d’iniquità?
word.german1912: Wer steht bei mir wider die Boshaften? Wer tritt zu mir wider die Übeltäter?
word.french1910: Qui se lèvera pour moi contre les méchants? Qui me soutiendra contre ceux qui font le mal?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰肯為我起來攻擊作惡的人呢？誰肯為我挺身而起對抗作孽的人呢？
word.korean: 누가 나를 위하여 일어나서 행악자를 치며 누가 나를 위하여 일어서서 죄악 행하는 자를 칠꼬
word.tagalog: Sino ang babangon dahil sa akin laban sa mga manggagawa ng kasamaan? Sinong tatayo dahil sa akin laban sa mga manggagawa ng kasamaan?
word.maori: Ko wai toku hei whakatika ake ki te hunga kino? Ko wai toku hei tu ake ki nga kaimahi i te hara?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang motindog alang kanako batok sa mga mamumuhat sa kadautan? Kinsa ka ang motindog alang kanako batok sa mga mamumumuhat sa kasal-anan?
word.hebrew: טז  מי-יקום לי עם-מרעים    מי-יתיצב לי עם-פעלי און
word.hebrewmodern: מי יקום לי עם מרעים מי יתיצב לי עם פעלי און׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.
word.thailand: ท่านผู้ที่รักพระเยโฮวาห์ ก็จงเกลียดชังความชั่ว พระองค์ทรงอารักขาชีวิตวิสุทธิชนของพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงช่วยเขาให้พ้นจากมือของคนชั่ว
word.spanish1909: Los que á Jehová amáis, aborreced el mal: Guarda él las almas de sus santos; De mano de los impíos los libra.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: O voi che amate l’Eterno, odiate il male! Egli custodisce le anime de’ suoi fedeli, li libera dalla mano degli empi.
word.german1912: Die ihr den HERRN liebet, hasset das Arge! Der HERR bewahret die Seelen seiner Heiligen; von der Gottlosen Hand wird er sie erretten.
word.french1910: Vous qui aimez l'Eternel, haïssez le mal! Il garde les âmes de ses fidèles, Il les délivre de la main des méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們愛耶和華的，都要恨惡罪惡；耶和華保護聖民的性命，救他們脫離惡人的手。
word.korean: 여호와를 사랑하는 너희여 악을 미워하라 저가 그 성도의 영혼을 보전하사 악인의 손에서 건지시느니라
word.tagalog: Oh kayong nagsisiibig sa Panginoon, ipagtanim ninyo ang kasamaan. Kaniyang iniingatan ang mga kaluluwa ng kaniyang mga banal; kaniyang iniligtas sila sa kamay ng masama.
word.maori: E te hunga e aroha ana ki a Ihowa, e kino ki te he: e tiakina ana e ia nga wairua o tana hunga tapu; e whakaorangia ana ratou e ia i nga ringa o te hunga kino.
word.cebuano: Oh kamo nga mga nahagugma kang Jehova, dumti ninyo ang dautan: Siya nagabantay sa mga kalag sa iyang mga balaan; Siya nagaluwas kanila gikan sa kamot sa mga dautan.
word.hebrew: י  אהבי יהוה    שנאו-רע שמר נפשות חסידיו    מיד רשעים יצילם
word.hebrewmodern: אהבי יהוה שנאו רע שמר נפשות חסידיו מיד רשעים יצילם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Yea, they sacrificed their sons and their daughters unto devils,
word.thailand: ท่านฆ่าบุตรชายและบุตรสาวของท่านถวายเป็นเครื่องสักการบูชาแก่ปีศาจ
word.spanish1909: Y sacrificaron sus hijos y sus hijas á los demonios;
word.latinvulgate: et seminaverunt agros et plantaverunt vineas, et fecerunt fructum nativitatis.
word.italian1927: e sacrificarono i loro figliuoli e le loro figliuole ai demoni,
word.german1912: Und sie opferten ihre Söhne und ihre Töchter den Teufeln
word.french1910: Ils sacrifièrent leurs fils Et leurs filles aux idoles,
